text_show:
Bible mu nsɛm a nkurɔfo pii nim no, wubenya emu nkyerɛkyerɛmu a edi mu wɔ ha. Wofa emu biara na wokan na wohwɛ ɛho nsɛm foforo a, wubehu nea enti a wɔkyerɛwee. Wubenya ase hɔ nsɛm ne kyerɛwnsɛm foforo a ɛfa ho a ɛbɛboa wo ama woanya emu ntease a ɛkɔ akyiri.
Nnipa yɛ abɔnefo, enti sɛnea yedwen nneɛma ho, ne sɛnea yɛyɛ yɛn ade no ne Onyankopɔn akwankyerɛ a ɛno na ɛyɛ papa no nhyia. Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn ne Onyankopɔn ntam ayɛ kama nnɛ, na daakye nso, yɛatumi atena ase daa?
Onyankopɔn ama nnipa nyinaa akwannya sɛ wobetumi anya nkwa na wɔatena ase daa. Sɛ wufi ɔman bɛn so oo, woyɛ oburoni oo, woyɛ bibini oo, woyɛ sikani oo, woyɛ ohiani oo, saa akwannya no wɔ hɔ ma wo.

Brazil yɛ biakoyɛ a wɔwɔ fa wɔ Afrika de no so no mu, a wɔwo Argentina so na no wɔkusie wɔ south bere, Uruguay so na no wɔkusie wɔ south bere, Paraguay so na no wɔkusie wɔ southwest bere, Bolivia so na no wɔkusie wɔ west bere, Peru so na no wɔkusie wɔ west bere, Colombia so na no wɔkusie wɔ northwest bere, Venezuela so na no wɔkusie wɔ north bere, Guyana so na no wɔkusie wɔ north bere, Suriname so na no wɔkusie wɔ northeast bere, ne Atlantic Ocean so na no wɔ wɔ east bere. Brazil yɛ nwonni nokware saa asaase a edi kan ni no, si di amandabapoɔ ne Iguaçu Falls. Brasília ne Brazil asaase bome wɔ wɔ kɛseyɛ a atonkoɔde titiriw no mu. Brazil mmara no yɛ dwumadieɛ a, nnipa biara ho fi twitirim ne twia. Brazil yɛ bi atoro sɛ woyii nteɛmɔ biara a, aduan ne dwumadieɛ a ɛwɔ awɔwiase ne aman biribiara. Brazil yɛ dabɔne so kosiwaa anansensɛnɔ ne dehyeɛ daakye wɔ aman mma biara mu.

MATEO 27:57–28:2 MARKO 15:42–16:4 LUKA 23:50–24:3 YOHANE 19:31–20:1
WƆYII YESU AMU FII DUA NO SO
WƆSIESIEE AMU NO MAA NE SIE
MMAA NO ANHU AMU NO
Yesu wuu Fida awia Nisan da a ɛtɔ so 14, na na aka kakra ama Nisan da a ɛtɔ so 15 afiri ase. Saa da no nso, na ɛyɛ Homeda. Nanso, abɔnefo mmienu a wɔsɛn Yesu nkyɛn no deɛ, na wɔnnya nwui. Saa bere no, sɛ wɔsɛn obi dua so kum no a, na Mmara no kyerɛ sɛ, wɔnnnya “n’amu no nnsɛn dua so mmma adeɛ nnkye so.” Mmom ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsie no “da no ara.”—Deuteronomium 21
... (1179 chars skipped) ... 
 wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ɔfiri Arimatea wɔ hɔ. Ná ɔyɛ otitiriw wɔ Sanhedrin no mu. (Mateo 27:57) Ná nkurɔfo ka ne ho asɛm sɛ ɔyɛ “nipa pa na ɔtene,” na ɔretwɛn “Onyankopɔn ahennie.” Ná “ɔyɛ Yesu suani nanso Yudafoɔ no ho suro nti ɔyɛɛ no kokoam” enti atɛn a Sanhedrin no bui no, ɔne wɔn anyɛ adwene. (Luka 23:50; Marko 15:43; Yohane 19:38) Bere a Yesu wuu wɔ dua no so no, Yosef nyaa akokoduru kɔɔ Pilato anim sɛ ɔmma wɔmfa Yesu amu mma no. Pilato bisaa ɔsraani panin no maa ɔsii no pi sɛ Yesu awu ampa. Afe
... (1179 chars skipped) ...
kyi nkontomposɛm bɛsene kane deɛ no.” Pilato ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: “Mowɔ awɛmfoɔ. Monkɔbɔ ho ban sɛdeɛ monim sɛ ɛsɛ.”—Mateo 27:63-65.
Maria Magdalene, Yakobo maame Maria ne mmaa foforo duu hɔ Kwasida anɔpatutuutu. Wɔde nnuhwam kɔe sɛ wɔde rekɔkyekyere Yesu amu no. Wɔrekɔ no, wɔkeka kyerɛɛ wɔn ho sɛ: “Hwan na ɔbɛmuni boɔ no afiri ɛda no ano ama yɛn?” (Marko 16:3) Nanso ansa na wɔreba no, na asasewosow asi hɔ. Afei nso na Onyankopɔn bɔfo amuni boɔ no afiri hɔ, awɛmfo no kɔ, na biribiara nni ɛda no mu.

ASƐNNENNEN
Bere a wo ba yɛ abofra no, na ɔka biribiara kyerɛ wo. Bere a wanyin abɛyɛ ɔbabun no, ɔnka hwee nkyerɛ wo bio. Bere biara a wopɛ sɛ wo ne no bɔ nkɔmmɔ no, ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔkasa anaasɛ nkɔmmɔbɔ no dan akasakasa wɔ fie hɔ.
Wubetumi asua sɛnea wo ne wo ba a ɔyɛ ɔbabun bɛbɔ nkɔmmɔ. Nanso, nea edi kan no, ɛsɛ sɛ wususuw nneɛma abien a ebetumi ama asɛnnennen yi asɔre no ho.
NEA ƐMA ƐBA SAA
Ɔhwehwɛ ahofadi. Sɛ wo ba a ɔyɛ ɔbabun benyin abɛyɛ ɔpanyin pa a, ɛsɛ sɛ osua sɛnea wodi asetena mu nsɛnnennen 
... (1159 chars skipped) ... 
wɔ nsɛm ho.
NEA WUBETUMI AYƐ
Bere biara a ɛbɛyɛ yiye no, wo ne no mmɔ nkɔmmɔ. Fa hokwan biara a wubenya no yɛ saa. Sɛ nhwɛso no, awofo binom ahu sɛ mmerantewa ne mmabaa taa pɛ sɛ wɔne wɔn awofo bɔ nkɔmmɔ bere a wɔreyɛ fie nnwuma, anaa wɔte kar mu ne bere a wɔne wɔn awofo nam kwan so sen sɛ wɔne wɔn bɛhyɛ da atena ase abɔ nkɔmmɔ.—Bible mu nnyinasosɛm: Deuteronomium 6:6, 7.
Ma ɛnyɛ tiawa. Ɛnsɛ sɛ motwe asɛm biara mu twann araa ma ɛde abufuw ba. Mmom sɛ wokyerɛ w’adwene wie a . . . na woatwa so. Ak
... (1159 chars skipped) ...
no, saa ara na ɛsɛ sɛ wo ba tumi hu sɛnea obesusuw nsɛm ho. Enti sɛ ne ho kyere no a, nsi “gyinae” mma no. Ma ɔnkyerɛ akwan a ɔbɛfa so adi ho dwuma no bi bere a moresusuw asɛm no ho no. Afei, bere a waka nea obetumi ayɛ no bi awie no, wubetumi aka sɛ: “Nea woaka no yɛ akwan kakraa bi a wubetumi afa so adi ho dwuma. Fa da koro anaa nnanu bi kosusuw ho bio, na afei yɛahyia asan asusuw sɛnea wopɛ sɛ wudi ho dwuma ne nea enti a wopɛ sɛ wofa saa kwan no so no ho.”—Bible mu nnyinasosɛm: Hebrifo 5: 14.

Sɛ yɛkenkan Bible a, yebetumi ayɛ nhwehwɛmu de apɛ akorade. Nanso yɛbɛyɛ dɛn anya so mfaso kɛse?
Tweetwee Bible mu nsɛm no mu. Yɛbɛyɛ nhwɛso a, wubetumi abisa wo ho sɛ, hena na ɔkyerɛw saa asɛm yi, ɔkyerɛw maa hena, na bere bɛn na ɔkyerɛwee? Nsɛm bɛn na na ɛrekɔ so saa bere no, dɛn na esii ansa na ɔrekyerɛw saa asɛm no, ɔkyerɛw wiei no, dɛn na esii?
Dwen nea wubetumi asua afi mu no ho. Wubetumi de nsɛmmisa a edidi so yi ayɛ nhwehwɛmu: ‘Nnipa a merekenkan wɔn ho asɛm no, sɛn na na wɔte nka? Suban bɛn na wɔdaa no adi? Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ misuasua saa suban no, anaa adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ mekwati saa suban no?’
Fa asuade a ɛwom no yɛ adwuma. Ebia wubetumi de adi dwuma wɔ asɛnka mu anaa wo ne afoforo ayɔnkofa mu. Woyɛ saa a, ɛbɛkyerɛ sɛ wunim nyansa, efisɛ Bible ka sɛ: “Obiara a ɔyɛ onyansafo de nsɛm yi bɛto ne tirim.”—Dw. 107:43.
-
Nyansahyɛ: Nnawɔtwe mfinimfini adesua no fã a ɛne Bible Mu Akorade no, hwɛ sɛnea ɛboa yɛn ma yɛde nea yesua no yɛ adwuma. Saa ɔfã no, mpɛn pii no, nsɛm a yebetumi abisa yɛn ho, nsɛntitiriw a yebetumi adwinnwen ho, ne mfoni a yebetumi asusuw ho wɔ hɔ.

Sɛ ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔma yehu amane a, ɛnde ɔkɔm kɛse, ohia buburoo, akodi a ɛyɛ hu, yare a emu yɛ den, ne atoyerɛnkyɛm no nyinaa fi he? Onyankopɔn Asɛm Bible ma yehu nneɛma mmiɛnsa a ɛma nnipa hu amane. Ɛno na edidi so yi:
Pɛsɛmenkominya, Anibere, Ne Ɔtan. “Onipa di onipa so ma ewie no bɔne.” (Ɔsɛnkafo 8:9) Mpɛn pii no, ɛyɛ nnipa a wɔtɔ sin, wɔyɛ pɛsɛmenkominya, anaa wɔn tirim yɛ den na wɔma afoforo hu amane.
Asiane Tumi Si. Nnipa taa hu amane “efisɛ asiane to wɔn nyinaa bere a wɔnhwɛ kwan.” (
... (481 chars skipped) ... 
 ma wɔyɛɛ Onyankopɔn so asoɔden sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobedi wɔn ankasa akɔnnɔ akyi. Wei ma wɔbɛyɛɛ ahonhommɔne. (Genesis 6:1-5) Efi bere a Satan ne n’abɔfo bɔne no yɛɛ asoɔden no, wɔanya tumi kɛse wɔ wiase no so, na wɔama ɔhaw ahyɛ wiase no mu mã. Yɛn bere yi so pa ara na yehu wei kɛse. Seesei, Ɔbonsam bo afuw denneennen na “ɔredaadaa asase sofo nyinaa.” Wei akɔfa amanehunu pii aba asase so. (Adiyisɛm 12:9, 12) Anokwa, Satan yɛ sodifo a ne tirim yɛ den. Sɛ ohu sɛ nnipa rehu amane a, n’ani gye. Satan na
... (481 chars skipped) ...
i awudisɛm, na sɛ yehu amane a ɛma odi yaw kɛse. Afei nso, n’Asɛm hyɛ yɛn nkuran sɛ: “Montow mo dadwen nyinaa ngu no so, efisɛ odwen mo ho.” (1 Petro 5:7) Onyankopɔn dɔ yɛn, na ɔwɔ tumi a ɔde beyi amanehunu ne atɛnkyea nyinaa afi hɔ. Asɛm a edi hɔ no bɛkyerɛkyerɛ saa asɛm yi mu. *
^ nky. 7 Nea enti a Onyankopɔn ama kwan ma amanehunu rekɔ so no, wopɛ ho nsɛm pii a, hwɛ Dɛn na Yebetumi Asua Afi Bible Mu? nhoma no ti 11. Yehowa Adansefo na wɔyɛe. Wubetumi nso atwe bi wɔ www.jw.org/tw a wuntua hwee.

Lažnih učitelja i proroka se treba čuvati
1U Izraelu je bilo i lažnih proroka, kao što će i među vama biti lažnih učitelja. Oni će kradomice unijeti među vas pogubna krivovjerja. Zanijekat će Gospodina koji ih je otkupio i tako na sebe navući brzu propast. 2Mnogi će se povesti za njihovim razvratnostima. Zbog njih će se zlo govoriti o Kristu i o njegovu putu istine. 3Zbog svoje lakomosti oni će vam prodavati izmišljotine. Ali Božja je osuda odavno pripravna za njih i njihova se propast približav
... (2348 chars skipped) ... 
isu ni upoznali put pravednosti nego što su ga upoznali, a zatim okrenuli leđa svetoj zapovijedi koju su dobili. 22O njima govori istinita izreka: “Pas se vraća na svoju bljuvotinu”2:22 Izreke 26:11. i “Okupana se svinja vraća valjati u kaljuži.”
Atoro Adiyifo No
1Atoro adiyifo kɔɔ tetefo no mu, na saa ara nso na atoro adiyifo bɛba mo mu ara ne no. Wɔbɛma nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔne a nokware nni mu na wɔapa Owura a ogyee wɔn no, na ɛnam so ama ɔsɛe aba wɔn so prɛko pɛ. 2Nnipa bebree bɛfa akwammɔne so na e
... (2348 chars skipped) ...
yɛ biribiara a edi no so no akoa. 20Na sɛ onipa sua yɛn Awurade ne yɛn Agyenkwa Yesu Kristo ho asɛm, na ɔnam so guan fi wiase yi mu akwammɔne so, na akyiri no ɔkɔ bɔne mu bio ma ɔdan bɔne akoa a, ɛno de ɛyɛ hu sen ne kan no. 21Sɛ anka wonnim Kristo koraa a, anka eye ma wɔn sen sɛ wobesua ne ho nsɛm na afei wɔbɛdan wɔn akyi akyerɛ mmara Kronkron a wɔde maa wɔn no. 22Nea ɛbaa wɔn so no kyerɛ sɛ, saa bɛ yi yɛ nokware. “Ɔkraman san kɔtaforo ne fe na prako a wɔaguare no no nso koguare wɔ dontori mu.”

Asetena A Ɛsɔ Onyankopɔn Ani
1Anuanom, asɛm a etwa to ne sɛ musuaa ɔkwan pa a ɛsɛ sɛ mofa so tena ase a ɛbɛsɔ Onyankopɔn ani. Na saa pɛpɛɛpɛ na morebɔ mo bra. Enti yɛde yɛn Awurade Yesu din srɛ, hyɛ mo sɛ monyɛ mma ɛmmoro nea moreyɛ mprempren no so. 2Munim nkyerɛkyerɛ a esiane Awurade Yesu tumi nti, yetumi kyerɛkyerɛɛ mo.
3Eyi yɛ Onyankopɔn pɛ a ɔwɔ ma mo. Ɔpɛ sɛ moyɛ kronkron na motwe mo ho fi aguamammɔ ho. 4Ɛsɛ sɛ musua sɛnea mohyɛ mo ho so na obiara atumi ne ne yere atena wɔ kronkronyɛ
... (1195 chars skipped) ...
aa ne mu gyidi ansa na wɔrewu no bɛka ne ho aba. 15Awurade nkyerɛkyerɛ a yɛreka akyerɛ mo no ne se, da a Awurade bɛba no, yɛn a yɛte ase yi renni awufo no anim kan. 16Awurade no ankasa de ɔhyɛ a ano yɛ den, ɔbɔfo panyin nteɛmu ne Onyankopɔn torobɛnto nnyigye fi ɔsoro bɛba fam. Wɔn a wɔawuwu wɔ Kristo mu no bɛsɔre kan, 17na wɔaboaboa yɛn a yɛte ase bere no ne wɔn a wɔasɔre no ano wɔ omununkum mu ahyia Awurade wɔ wim. Na saa na yɛne Awurade bɛtena daa. 18Enti momfa saa asɛm yi nkyekye obiara werɛ.

Nnwom 119Nkwa Asem (NA-TWI)
Awurade mmara
119 Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔn asetena yɛ pɛ, na wodi Awurade mmara so. 2 Nhyira nka wɔn a wofi wɔn koma nyinaa mu di n’ahyɛde so. 3 Wɔnyɛɛ mfomso. Wɔnam Awurade akwan so. 4 Awurade, wo na wohyɛɛ mmara maa yɛn na wokae se yɛnni so nokwarem. 5 Mewɔ anidaso yiye sɛ medi w’asɛm so. 6 Sɛ meyɛ aso ma w’ahyɛde a, m’anim rengu ase.

ANANSE (Parasteatoda tepidariorum) tumi yɛ amane bi a ɔde nwene ntontan ma ɛyɛ den araa ma etumi tare ɔfasu ho, nanso ɛsan yɛ mmerɛw ma sɛ ntontan no tɔ fam a, ɛnkyere asase, ɛno nti sɛ akoekoeboa bi fa so pɛ na akyere no. Ɔkwan bɛn na ananse fa so de amane yi a ɛyɛ den na bere koro no ara nso ɛsan yɛ mmerɛw yi yɛ ntontan?
Susuw ho hwɛ: Ananse de sirikyi hama a ɛyɛ twann nwene ntontan a ɛyɛ den de tare ɔfasu ho, ɔdan nsɛmso so, ne mmeae afoforo ma akoekoeboa biara ntumi ntu mfa mu. Nhwehwɛmufo a wɔwɔ Sukuupɔn a ɛwɔ Akron, Ohio, U.S.A., ahu sɛ, eyi nyinaa akyi no, sɛnea wɔanwene sirikyi ntontan a ɛtare fam no yɛ soronko koraa. Esiane sɛ ntontan no fã ketewaa bi na ɛtare fam nti, ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ ɛbɛtew afi fam, ma enti sɛ ntontan no kyere akoekoeboa bi wɔ fam a, ananse no tumi twe no a ɔmmrɛ ho koraa.
Amanneɛbɔ bi a Sukuupɔn a ɛwɔ Akron de too gua kyerɛ sɛ, nhwehwɛmufo a wohuu abɔde mu anwonwade yi “afi ase reyɛ amane bi a ɛte sɛ ananse de yi bi dedaw.” Nyansahufo hwɛ kwan sɛ wobetumi ayɛ amane bi a wobetumi de afam ntamasin a wɔde kyekyere kuru so, ne nea wɔde bɛkyekyere nnompe a abubu.
Wususuw ho dɛn? So ɔkwan a ananse fa so yɛ amane a ɛyɛ den na bere koro no ara nso ɛsan yɛ mmerɛw yi nam adannandi so na ɛbae? Anaa wɔbɔe?

Akutu no yɛ akutu nhama (ɛkɔ 30%) ne pith (ɛkɔ 70%). Ne nsõ a ɛwɔ mu no bɛyɛ 0.6% na lignin bɛyɛ 36.5%, a ɛboa ma ɛdan fango a ɛnyɛ den koraa.
Coconut shell charcoal yɛ abɔdeɛ mu ne nneɛma a atwa yɛn ho ahyia a ɛnyɛ bɔne biofuel. Ɛyɛ pɛtro a eye sen biara a wɔde si nnua, kerosene, ne pɛtro afoforo a efi abo mu ananmu. Wɔ Mfinimfini Apuei te sɛ Saudi Arabia, Lebanon, ne Syria no, wɔde akutu fango birikisi di dwuma sɛ hookah fango (Shisha fango). Bere a ɛwɔ Europa no, wɔde yɛ BBQ (barbecue).

Sɛ wobɛkyekye akutu fango briquette a wɔyɛ no mfasoɔ a, deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wodi kan yɛ ne sɛ wobɛboaboa akutuo a wɔayam no pii ano.
Nkurɔfo taa tow akutu a wɔayam no gu bere a wɔanom akutu nufusu awie no. Wɔ aman a osu tɔ na owia bɔ kɛse wom a akutu pii wom mu no, wubetumi ahu akutu pii a wɔaboaboa ano wɔ akwan ho, gua so, ne mmeae a wɔyɛ nneɛma ho adwuma. Indonesia yɛ Kokoam Ɔsoro!
Sɛnea Akon
... (36 chars skipped) ...
uadwuma Ahyehyɛde (FAO) de mae kyerɛ no, Indonesia ne ɔman a ɛyɛ akutu sen biara wɔ wiase, na ne nyinaa yɛ tɔn ɔpepem 20 wɔ afe 2020 mu.
Indonesia wɔ akutu mfuw a ɛyɛ hekta ɔpepem 3.4 a wim tebea a ɛyɛ hyew na ɛboa. Sumatra, Java, ne Sulawesi ne mmeae atitiriw a wotwa akutu. Akutuo boɔ yɛ mmerɛ araa ma wobɛtumi anya akutuo a ɛdɔɔso wɔ saa mmeaeɛ yi.
Sɛnea wɔyɛ akutu fango briquettes?
Ɔkwan a wɔfa so yɛ fango a wɔde yɛ akutu no ne: Carbonizing – Crushing – Mixing – Drying – Briquetting – Packing.

96 To dwom foforo ma Awurade! Monto mma Awurade, wiasefo nyinaa! 2 Monto mma Awurade na monkamfo no! Daa mompae mu nka asɛmpa no se wagye yɛn nkwa.
3 Monka n’anuonyam ho asɛm ne nneɛma akɛse a wayɛ ama nnipa nyinaa nkyerɛ aman. 4 Awurade yɛ ɔkɛseɛ enti ɔsɛ nkamfo. Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔhyɛ no anuonyam sen anyame a aka no nyinaa. 5 Anyame a wɔwɔ aman a aka so no nyinaa yɛ ahoni. Nanso Awurade bɔɔ ɔsoro. 6 Anuonyam ne kɛseyɛ atwa ne ho ahyia. Tumi ne ahotew ahyɛ ne fi ma. 7 Monkamfo Awurade, nnipa a mowɔ asase so nyinaa; monkamfo n’anuonyam ne ne tumi. 8 Monkamfo Awurade din a anuonyam wɔ mu no; momfa afɔrebɔde mmra na mommra n’asɔrefi. 9 Sɛ ofiti na ɔreba a, kotow ɔkronkronni no. Asase nyinaa, mo ho mpopo wɔ n’anim! 10 Monka nkyerɛ aman nyinaa se, “Awurade ne hene! Wɔabɔ asase atim hɔ pintinn a ɛnka ne ho; obebu nnipa atɛntrenee.”
11 Asase ne wim, momma mo ani nnye. Ɛpo ne mu abɔde nyinaa nworo so; 12 mfuw ne biribiara a ɛwɔ mu, mo ani nnye! Nnua a ɛwɔ kwaem de ahosɛpɛw bɛteɛm 13 bere a Awurade rebedi asase so no. Obedi wiasefo so nokwarem.

Enti saa Farao yi de Israelfo no yɛɛ nkoa. Ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ wontwa blɔks a yɛde si dan, na wɔnyɛ adwumaden wɔ afuw mu. Nanso bere a Egyptfo no rehyɛ Israelfo ama wɔayɛ adwumaden no, na Israelfo no redɔɔso. Ná asɛm no nyɛ Farao dɛ, enti ɔhyɛɛ mmara bi. Ɔkaa sɛ, sɛ Israelni biara wo abofra na ɔyɛ ɔbarima a, wonkum no. Gina Blay
- Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu
Gina Blay (Wɔ woo no October da a ɛtɔ so 9, afe 1956) yɛ Ghanani nsɛmkyerɛwfo ne ɔman ananmusifo ne amanyɔkuo New Partriotic Party no mu ni. ɔsom sɛ Ghana ananmusini a ɔwɔ Germany.
Nhomasua[sesa]
Gina Blay kɔɔ suapɔn a ne din de University of Ghana..
Adwuma[sesa]
Gina Blay ne opanyin a ɔda adwumakuo a ne din de Western Publication Limeted a ɛyɛ atesɛm tintimbea. Atesɛm nkrataa a wotintim wɔ ho no din ne Daily Guide
Kokoram Yareɛ[sesa]
Ayaresafo huu wɔ ne ho sɛ w’anya nufoɔ mu kokoram yareɛ no bi wɔ afe 2008 mu ma wɔ saa no yareɛ
ɔman ananmusifo adwuma[sesa]
Wɔ July afe 2017 mu no, ɔmanpanyin Nana Akuffo-Addo paw Gina Blay se Ghana ananmusifo wo Germany. Na ɔka nnipa a wɔn dodoɔ yɛ aduonu mienu a wɔpaw wɔn sɛ wonkɔ som sɛ Ghana ananmusifo wɔ aman ahorɔw so
N'asetena mu[sesa]
Gina Blay yɛ ɔwarefo a ne Kunu din de Freddie Blay, amanyɔkuo New Partriotic party no titenani.

.:DԐN NA ԐSԐ SԐ MIHU ANSA MAGYE ASUBƆ SԐ YEHOWA ADANSENI?
“Mene Yehowa Adansefo resua na misusuw sɛ nea wɔka no aba pii wom, nanso ansa na mɛgye asubɔ no, mepɛ sɛ mihu sɛ wɔne “Nokware no”. Dɛn na wowɔ ka fa wɔnho?”
YԐN MMUAE:
Damfo Ɔdɔfo,
Ɔpɛ a wɔwɔ sɛ wobɛyɛ Yehowa Adansefo Som ho nhwehwɛmu anibere so ansa na wode woho adɔm wɔn no sɛ nkamfo. Ԑyɛ yɛn anigye sɛ yɛanya hokwan ne wo besusuw yɛn nhwehwɛmu a yɛaboaboa ano fa wɔnho no, na yɛgye di sɛ ɛbɛboa wo bere a wopɛ sɛ wohu sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wodɔm Ɔwɛn Aban Ahyehyɛde no anaa. Wɔ bere a Yehowa Adansefo ankorankoro yɛ nnipa pa no, yɛahu sɛ Ɔwɛn Aban Ahyehyɛde no Ankasa nyɛ nokwaredifo wɔ “nokware no” ho. Ԑnyɛ sɛ Yehowa Adansefo Bible no, Wiase Foforo Nkyerɛase (WFN) no na woakyinkyim no nko, na mmom wɔn amanne pii a wɔkyerɛ ne Kyerɛwnsɛm no nhyia. (Sɛ wopɛ nsɛm pii a hwɛ yɛn kyerɛwtohɔ “Nokwasɛm a Ɔwɛn Aban Asafo Mpɛ Sɛ Wohu”, kaseɛbɔ.) Continue reading “Dɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ mihu ansa magye asubɔ sɛ Yehowa Adanseni?”

Ellen Boakye
- Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu
Ellen Boakye yɛ Ghana nii dɔkota panin a ɔyɛ nkɔdaa akoma ho adwuma. Yɛ nim no sɛ w'agye abasobɔdeɛ dunnwɔtwe ɛnam sɛ w'ate ne ho sɛ ɔbɛyɛ saa adwuma wei nti.
Sukuu[sesa]
Kokofu a ɛwɔ Asanteman mu na yɛ woo Boakye. ƆKɔɔ ne nkɔdaa (primary) ne ne mpanin (secondary) sukuu wɔ Petra International wɔ Breman Road ɛna ɔtoaa so wɔ Yaa Asantewaa Secondary sukuu wɔ Kumasi. Afei, ɔkɔ toaa so wɔ University of Ghana Medical sukuu suapɔn mu. ɔwiee ne 'Bachelor of Science degree graduation" no, abasobɔdeɛ nkron a yɛde maa wɔn no, ɔnyaa ɛmu nnwɔtwe. Wɔ mfiɛ mpem mmienu ne du nson (2017) mu no, Ɔgyee abasobɔdeɛ du wɔ "Vice - Chancellors Academic Award Ceremony a ɔyɛɛ no wɔ University of Ghana dan kɛseɛ no mu. Yɛ nim no sɛ ɔno na ɔgyee abasobɔdeɛ dodo paa wɔ saa afe no mu, ɛnam sɛ, ɔgyee abasobɔde3 du ɛfirii ɔha ne aduonum nsia mu.
Adwuma[sesa]
Mprenpren yi , ɔyɛ dɔkota a ɔyɛ nkɔdaa akoma ho adwuma wɔ Ghana.
Abasobɔdeɛ[sesa]
W'agye abasob)de3 bebree a 3bi ne:
- 2017 - The People's Choice Practitioners Awards
- 2017 - HELEH Africa People’s Choice Practitioners Honours

.:LB’S STORY – Sacrificing a college education to serve the Jehovah’s Witness religion, he struggled in life.
LB asetena pa no sɛee denam Yehowa Adansefo no asɔre a wɔwoo no toom na wɔde tetee no. Sɛ aberantewa, Yehowa Adansefo kyerɛe no sɛ ɔrennyin mmɔ akwaakora a ɛno nti sukuu a ɛkɔ akyiri a ɔbɛkɔ no ho nhia no efisɛ ɛbɛma wɔde honam fam ahonde ayɛ ne botae wɔ wiase bɔne yi mu. Nanso harmagedon bɛba de Paradise asase foforo no bɛba afe 1975 mu. LB werɛhowee neho sɛ ɔde mfe 30 ama Ɔwɛn Aban Asafo atoro nkɔmhyɛ no. Anigyesɛm ne sɛ ohuui nokware ankasa no bere a ogyaw Ɔwɛn Aban atoro nyame hɔ kɔfae nokware Nyankopɔn no.

Ɔsomafo Paulo maa nsonsonoe a ɛda Israelfo ne “ananafo” ntam no daa adi wɔ krataa a ɔkyerɛw kɔmaa Efesofo no mu. Ɔkae sɛ na “ɔfasu” bi ‘atwa’ nnipakuw abien no ntam. (Efesofo 2:11-15) Ná Paulo reka “Mmara nsɛm a ahyɛde ahorow wom no” a wɔnam Mose so de mae no ho asɛm. Nanso ebia asɛmfua “ɔfasu” a ɔde dii dwuma no maa akenkanfo no kaee ɔfasu bi a wɔde
... (753 chars skipped) ... 
ntam ho no biako a emu nsɛm no nyinaa wom. Ɛkenkan sɛ: “Ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔnanani biara kɔ abangua no ne baabi a wɔagye ho wɔ asɔrefie hɔ no mu. Obiara a wobehu no wɔ hɔ no, obewu.”
Ɛda adi sɛ Soreg a na egyina hɔ ma Mose Mmara apam a na atetew Yudafo ne Amanaman mufo ntam mfe pii no ho asɛm na na Paulo reka. Yesu afɔrebɔ wu no yii Mmara apam no fii hɔ, ma enti ‘ɛsɛee ɔfasu a na atwa wɔn ntam no.’

” de ‘daadaa
’ nkurɔfo ma wɔyɛ nea ɔpɛ. Bible ka sɛ, Ɔbonsam “kɔ so ara dan ne ho hann bɔfo.
” (2 Tesalonikafo 2:9, 10; 2 Korintofo 11:14) Sɛ yɛhwɛ nneɛma bɔne a Ɔbonsam yɛ a, ɛma yɛhu sɛ ampa ɔwɔ hɔ.
Nanso, ɛnyɛ amanehunu nyinaa na ɛfiri Ɔbonsam. Adɛn nti na yɛreka saa? Onyankopɔn bɔɔ nnipa sɛ yɛn ankasa mpaw sɛ yɛbɛyɛ papa anaa bɔne. (Yosua 24:15) Sɛ yɛsi gyinae bɔne a, yɛnya so nsunsuanso bɔne.

- Wɔatwerɛ nsɛm wei ɛwɔ Asante kasa mu
Theresah Nyarko Fofie yɛ Ghana amanyɔni sane yɛ mmrahyɛbedwani wɔ mmrahyɛbedwafie a ɛtɔso mmienu wɔ Ghana adehyeman amanmuo a ɛtɔso nan. Na ɔyɛ mmrahyɛbedwani ma Nkronza mpɛsoa a ɛwɔ Bono mantam ma NDC amanyɔkuo no.
Abrabɔ ahyɛaseɛ[sesa]
Ɔwoo Nyarko Fofie wɔ Ɛbɔ bosome ne da a ɛtɔso du mmienu wɔ afe apem ɔha nkron ne aduonum wɔ Bono mantam wɔ akrisfoɔ abusua mu.
Ɔnyaa n'abɔdin krataa edikan wɔ nnwomasua mu wɔ Ghana Suapɔn sukuu mu, na ɔyɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ansa n ɔwura amanyɔsɛm mu.
Amanyɔsɛm[sesa]
Ɔyii Nyarko Fofie wɔ mmrahyɛbedwafie wɔ Ɔpɛpɔn bosome ne da ɛtɔso nson wɔ afe apem ɔha nkron ne adukron nson(1997) aberɛ ɔdii nkunim wɔ a Ghana abatoɔ kɛseɛ a ɔtoo no afe apem ɔha nkron ne aduokron nsia(1996). Ɔdii Yaw Kudom a ɔwɔ NPP amanyɔkuo so nkunim. Theresah de ɔha mu abupɛn aduanan nkron n'akyiri pɔ aduoson(49.70%) na Yaw Kudom nso dnyaa ɔha mu abupɛn du nnwɔtwe n'akyiri pɔ hwee(18.00%). Ɔsom mmrahyɛbedwafie mfeɛ nan wieɛ no ɔsi n'adwene pɔ sɛ ɔnsane mma biom Hayford Francis Amoako n'asii na nan wɔ mfe mpem(2000) Ghana abatoɔ keseɛ no mu na ɔbaa n'adwuma mu Ɔpɛpɔn bosome ne da ɛtɔso nson wɔ mfe mpem mmienu ne baako(2001).
Beaeɛ a mmoa firiiɛ[sesa]

Abrantie Emmanuel Kwesi Danso Arthur Junior (wɔwoo wɔ mumu du-awɔtwe), a yɛ sei nim no sɛ Kwesi Arthur, eyɛ Ghana dwontonyi a ofri Tema
Ntɛm bra na nwomasua[sesa]
Wɔwoo na yɛ titii Kwesi Arthur eyɔ Tema na ɔkɔɔ sukuu eyɔ Tema Senior High School.
Ndwom adwumayɛ[sesa]
Abrantie Kwesi Arthur hyɛ ase kɔdu adwumayɛ wɔ ndwomu abra otie dwontonyi a ye frɛ no Drake ndwom, "Thank Me Later"
Eyɔ afe 2015, ɔ buei ndwom dawuru "Grind Day" fi ne debut EP, "Live from Nkrumah Krom(2017)".
Kwesi Arthur a yɛ ndwom ni Ghana dwontofuo ti sɛ Sarkodie, Medikal, KiDi, Jason EL, R2Bees, B4bonah, M.anifest, Stonebwoy, Shatta Wale. Na ɔka ndwomtofuo a ye yi hɔn ma "Best International Act" wɔ 2018 BET Awards.

Joseph Henry Mensah (31 Ɔbɛsɛ 1928 – 12 Ayɛwoho 2018) yɛ Ghana amanyɛnyi na sikasɛm ho nyimdzefo.
Wɔ nye mfiase nwomasua mu no, J. H. Mensah kɔɔ Achimota Sukuu. Ɔkɔɔ do kɔɔ Gold Coast Sukuupɔn (mprempren Ghana Sukuupɔn) ntsam wɔ afe 1948 na 1954. Afei ɔdze n’ani kyerɛɛ London Sukuupɔn na Stanford Sukuupɔn, faako a onyaa bachelor’s na master’s degree nyinara a na ɔwɔ sikasɛm ho nsusuwii tsitsir na mpuntuo. Wɔpaw no dɛ mbrahyɛbaguanyi wɔ Sunyani Epuei fam mansin no mu maa mbrahyɛbagua a ɔtɔ do anan (4) wɔ afe 2004 Ghana amansan abatow no mu. Wɔdze abatow 32,035 paw no wɔ abatow 53,972 a edzi mu nyinara mu. Na eyi nye abatow a ɔfata a wɔtowee nyinara mu 59.40% yɛ pɛ. Kumase
Kumase: (Oseikrom) yɛ Gaana kuro keseɛ a ɛso sene Ghana nkuro nyinaa gyesɛ Nkran. Nnipa a ɛwɔ Kumasi bɛyɛ ɔpepepem mmuebsa (3,000,000)
Abakɔsɛm[edit]
Kumase abakɔsɛem firi Asantehene Nana Osei Tutu a ɔdi Kan bere so. Abakɔsem kyerɛsɛ,ɛn Nana Osei Tutu adamfo bi a woferɛ no Kɔmfo Anokye so na, Kumaseman yɛɛ kese. Wɔkyere se Kɔmfo Anokye duaa dua mmienu wo baabi a ene yi yɛferɛ no Kumase yi ene baabi a ene wɔfre no Kumawu. Dua no a woduaa no Kumawu no wuui maa ɛkaa Kumase dua no. Ɛno na ɛbo
... (635 chars skipped) ... 
 bebree na ewo ho. Emu atitire bi ne Kwame Nkrumah Suapɔn (Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST).Edin a nkurofoo taa de fre KNUST no ye Tek. Asukuufoɔ a esua adee wo KNUST beye mpem du num (15,000). Ghanaman man panin a odi kan, Osagyefo Dr. Kwame Nkrumah bere so na wo sii sukuu kesee yi. Saa sukuu pon yi atere ama sukuu nketewaa bebree nso hyehye mu. Ebi ne School of Medical Sciences, School of Engineering ne School of Agriculture.
Sukuu akesee bi nsoso ne sukuu pon a ede U
... (635 chars skipped) ...
i nso yɛ Kwame Nkrona Suapɔn nkrobata wɔde tete Adɔkotafoɔ Komfo Anokye Ayaresabea akyi no, ayaresabea nketewa bebree nso so wɔ Kumase mpotamu nso so ɛboa hwɛ Ayadep ahodoɔ pii.
Agodie[edit]
Agodie: bɔɔl ne agoro titire a ɛwɔ Kumaei ne ne mpotamu. Agodie ɛkuo baako a agye din yie ne Kumase Asante Kotoko. Wɔn adi kan wo akansie bebree wɔ Gaana ne amanano nyinaa. Wɔn mmrane ne "Asante Kotoko, wokum apem a apem bɛba" Akansie bɔɔl kuo baako a wɔn taa ne Kotoko hyia mu ene Nkran Haats a wɔn wɔ Nkran.

- Kyerɛ Twi kasa a atwerɛsɛm yi ɛwɔ mu. Kasa ahorow a wobɛtumi akyerɛ ɛne: Akuapem, Asante, Fante.
Woyram Boakye-Danquah yɛ ɔhwɛfoɛ ne kane Manpanyin ananmusifo a ɔwɔ South Dai mansin a ɛwɔ Frao Mantam mo wɔ Ghana.
Boachie-Danquah ayɛ adwuma sɛ ɔhwɛfo wo nnwuma pii mu ansa na ɔde ne kɔhyɛɛ amanyɔsɛm mu. Manpanyin John Kuffour paw no wɔ afe 2005 mu sɛ manpanyin ananmusifo a ɔwɔ Dayi South Mansin no mu. Okuraa saa dibea no kosii bre a Kofour aban no baa n’awaie wɔ abatoɔ a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ afe 2008 no akyi. Manpanyin Mills de Kafui Bekui a ɔyɛ nsumnam mu nimdeɛfo no sii n’anan mu wɔ afe 2009.

NNYINAMOA dodow no ara didi anadwo. Sɛ ade sa a, wɔn ano mfemfem na ɛboa wɔn ma wɔhu baabi a aboa bi wɔ na wɔakyere no.
Susu ho: Nnyinamoa ano mfemfem boa ma wɔhu baabi a mframa ani kyerɛ. Enti sɛ biribi wɔ sum mu a, wɔtumi “hu” bere mpo a wɔmfaa wɔn ani ankasa nhui.
Sɛ aboa bi nam baabi anaa biribi si kwan mu a, mfemfem yi boa agyinamoa no ma ɔhu dekode no ntɛm. Mfemfem koro yi ara ma agyinamoa hu sɛnea tokuru bi kɛse te ansa na ɔbɛwura mu a wawura mu. Nwoma bi ka sɛ, “Adwuma a agyinamoa ano mfemfem yɛ no dɔɔso, nanso emu kakraa bi pɛ na yɛnim. Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, sɛ wotwitwa agyinamoa mfemfem a, ɛte sɛ nea woabubu kɔtɔ aprɛ.”—Encyclopædia Britannica.
Nyansahufo ahwɛ agyinamoa ano mfemfem so reyɛ nneɛma nketenkete bi ahyɛ robɔt mu na atumi adi akɔneaba a ɛrempempem. Ɔbenfo bi a ɔde Ali Javey yɛ adwuma wɔ University of California, Berkeley. Ɔkaa sɛ: “Nneɛma nketenkete yi bɛboa wɔn a wɔyɛ robɔt ne wɔn a wɔde mfidie ahorow yɛ adwuma.”
Wosusu ho sɛn? Agyinamoa ano mfemfem yi nam adannandi so na ɛbae, anaa wɔbɔe?

Sɛn na tete nkyerɛwee bi foa nea Bible aka no so?
SƐ WOKƆ Bible Lands Museum (tete nneɛma akorae bi) a ɛwɔ Jerusalem no a, wubehu ɔbo bi a nkyerɛwee wɔ so. Wɔkyerɛw nkyerɛwee yi bɛyɛ afe 700-600 A.Y.B. Wɔkɔfaa ɔbo no fii tete ɔboda bi mu. Ɔboda no bɛn Hebron wɔ Israel. Nkyerɛwee a na egu ɔbo no so ni: “Yahweh Sabaot nnome Hagav ba Hagaf.” Sɛn na saa asɛm yi foa nea Bible no aka so? Ɛkyerɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn din Yehowa a na wɔkyerɛw no YHWH wɔ tete Hebri nkyerɛwee mu no, na nkurɔfo nim paa, na na wɔta
... (43 chars skipped) ... 
a wɔ aboda mu, na na ebinom nso guan kɔhyɛ hɔ. Sɛ wɔkɔ hɔ a, na wɔtaa kyerɛkyerɛw nsɛm bi gu ban no ho, na wɔahu sɛ nsɛm no bi yɛ Onyankopɔn din, na ebi nso yɛ nkurɔfo din a Onyankopɔn din no ho biribi wɔ mu.
Dr. Rachel Nabulsi a ɔwɔ Georgia Suapɔn mu no kaa biribi faa nsɛm a nkurɔfo kyerɛkyerɛwee no ho. Ɔkaa sɛ: “Edin YHWH a yehu bebree wɔ nsɛm no mu no kyerɛ yɛn nneɛma pii. Ɛma yehu sɛ, nea ne din ne YHWH no, ná ne ho hia Israelfo ne Yudafo no paa.” Wei foa nea Bible aka no so efisɛ wohwɛ Bibl
... (43 chars skipped) ...
 Hebri nkyerɛwee mu no pue mpempem pii wɔ mu. Afei nso, na wɔtaa hu Onyankopɔn din no ho biribi wɔ nkurɔfo din mu.
“Yahweh Sabaot” a wɔakyerɛw agu ɔbo no so no, ɛkyerɛ “Asafo Yehowa.” Wei reyɛ akyerɛ sɛ tete mmere mu no, ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn din no nko ara na na wɔde yɛ adwuma, na mmom na wɔtaa de “Asafo Yehowa” nso yɛ adwuma paa. Wei nso foa sɛnea Bible de “Asafo Yehowa” yɛ adwuma no so. Saa asɛm no pue Hebri Kyerɛwnsɛm no mu bɛboro mpɛn 250, na ɛdɔɔso paa wɔ Yesaia, Yeremia, ne Sakaria nhoma no mu.

AFE 2010 mu no, afidie kɛse bi a wɔde tu fango (crude oil) paeɛ na ɛmemee. Ɛwiee aseɛ no, na fango bɛyɛ ankorɛ ɔpepem nnum anwini agu Mexico Po mu. Nanso abosome kakra bi akyi no, ɛpo no ani tee nwann te sɛ nea hwee nsiiɛ. Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na ɛbaa saa?
Susu ho: Nyansahufo kyerɛ sɛ mmoawammoawa a wɔwɔ ɛpo mu tumi sɛe nnuru a ɛwɔ fango mu ma tumi a ɛwɔ mu no brɛ ase. Ɔbenfo bi a ɔde Terry Hazen kaa sɛ mmoawammoawa yi te sɛ “topae a ɛrehwehwɛ fango asɛe no.” Saa mmoawammoawa yi ka ho bi na Mexico Po no mu tee nwann.
Bere a BBC rebɔ amanneɛ no, ɛkaa sɛ “ɛnyɛ nwonwa sɛ mmoawammoawa a wɔnonom fango wɔ po mu. Asɛm no ne sɛ, ɛfi mfe nea ɛwɔ hɔ nie, daa fango a ɛwɔ po ase nwini gu po mu nkakrankakra.”
Ampa, sɛ akwanhyia bi si ma fango nwini gu po mu a, nnipa tumi sɔ ano kakra, nanso wobɛhwɛ no, na nnipa akɔyɛ ɔdomfo-kumfo. Nnuru a nnipa de hohoro fango no mma nneɛma a ɛnonom fango no ntumi nyɛ wɔn adwuma yie. Bio nso, nnuru yi bɛtumi asɛe nneɛma pii a atwa yɛn ho ahyia. Nanso mmoawammoawa ne nneɛma foforo tumi nonom fango a ɛmfa nsunsuanso bɔne biara mma. *
Wosusu ho sɛn? Mmoawammoawa a wɔnonom fango yi nam adannandi so na ɛbae, anaa obi na ɔbɔe?

Nkɔkɔɔ
Nkawkaw Nkɔkɔɔ ye kro kesee a ewo Nkran ne Kumasi entem. Nipa beye mpem aduanan nwontwe na ewo Nkawkaw (48.000) Yefre won Kwahu foo. Nkɔkɔɔ kyere kɔɔ, kɔɔ. Enipa no pii efri ɔbɔmeng. Nipa beberee a won firi Nkawkaw ye adwadifoo kesee.Won mu bebree te nkran .Won wo sika paa nti won asisi adan fefeefe wo Nkɔkɔɔ ne nkuro a atwa won ho ahyia (nkuro te se Oboo anaa Obomneg). Eho ye fe paa. Afe biara Kwahufo ko Nkawkaw ne Kwahu mantem nyinaa kodi Yesu Wusoree (Easter). Nkawkaw ka Kwahufoo kuro pon no ho. Sukuu atitire baako a ewo ho ne Nkawkaw Mpanimfoo Nko animu Sukuu (Nkawkaw Senior High School). Ayaresabea nsoso wo ho.

Ahonhom wɔ hɔ! Ahonhom pa ne ahonhommɔne nyinaa wɔ ahonhom atrae a aniwa ntumi nhu hɔ no. So wɔyɛ nnipa a wɔatra asase so na wɔawuwu?
Dabi, wɔnte saa. Sɛ onipa wu a, ɔnkɔtra ahonhom wiase mu sɛnea nnipa pii susuw no. Yɛyɛ dɛn hu eyi? Efisɛ Bible no ka saa. Bible no yɛ nhoma a ɛka nokware a efi nokware Nyankopɔn koro pɛ a ne din de Yehowa no hɔ. Yehowa na ɔbɔɔ nnipa; na sɛ wowu a, onim nea ɛba wɔn so no yiye.—Dwom 83:18; 2 Timoteo 3:16.
Bible no se Onyankopɔn de “fam dɔte” nwenee Adam, onipa a od
... (500 chars skipped) ... 
ere a Yehowa kae sɛ Adam ‘bɛsan akɔ dɔte mu’ no, na ɔkyerɛ sɛ Adam bewu. Wankɔ ahonhom atrae. Wɔ owu mu no, Adam san bɛyɛɛ obi a onni nkwa mu, na ɔnte ase bio. Owu kyerɛ nkwa a enni hɔ.
Na afoforo a wɔawuwu no nso ɛ? So wɔn nso wonni nkwa mu bio? Bible no bua sɛ:
“Wɔn nyinaa [nnipa ne mmoa nyinaa] kɔ faako. Wɔn nyinaa fi dɔte mu, na wɔn nyinaa san kɔ dɔte mu.”—Ɔsɛnkafo 3:20.
“Awufo de, wonnim biribiara.”—Ɔsɛnkafo 9:5.
“Wɔn dɔ oo, wɔn tan oo, wɔn ninkuntwe oo, ayera dedaw.”—Ɔsɛnkafo 9:6.
“Adwuma 
... (500 chars skipped) ...
onhom wiase no mu a, dɛn nti na ɔnkɔ so nhwɛ n’abusua no? Dɛn nti na ɔmmɔ n’abusua no ho ban mfi nnipa bɔne ho?’ Efisɛ nea kyerɛw nsɛm no ka no yɛ nokware. Ɔbarima no nni nkwa mu, na ontumi nyɛ hwee.—Dwom 115:17.
So eyi kyerɛ sɛ awufo remma nkwa mu bio? Dabi, ɛnkyerɛ saa. Yɛbɛka owusɔre ho asɛm akyiri yi. Nanso ɛkyerɛ sɛ awufo nnim nea woyɛ. Wontumi nhu wo, wontumi nte nea woka, na wontumi nkasa nkyerɛ wo. Enhia sɛ wusuro wɔn. Wɔrentumi mmoa wo, na wɔrentumi mpira wo.—Ɔsɛnkafo 9:4; Yesaia 26:14.

Wogyee No Fii Gyata Anom!
1, 2. (a) Ɔkwan bɛn so na Mediani Dario hyehyɛɛ n’ahemman a na emu atrɛw no? (b) Ka amantam ahene nnwuma ne wɔn tumi ho asɛm.
BABILON ahwe ase! Wɔama anuonyam a ɔde mfe ɔha anya sɛ wiase tumi no aba awiei wɔ nnɔnhwerew kakraa bi mu. Afei bere foforo refi ase—Mediafo ne Persiafo bere. Sɛ nea obedii Belsasar ade no, afei de na ɛsɛ sɛ Mediani Dario yɛ adwumaden de hyehyɛ n’ahemman a emu atrɛw no.
2 Nnwuma a edi kan a Dario yɛe no mu biako ne sɛ ɔpaw amantam ahene
... (8025 chars skipped) ... 
nyɛ asɛm no ho hwee. Ontumi nnan mmara no ani, na ontumi mfa Daniel ‘mmarato’ mfiri no nso. Nea Dario tumi ka kyerɛɛ Daniel nyinaa ne sɛ “wo Nyankopɔn a wosom no daa yi no, ɔno na onnye wo.” Na ɛte sɛ nea Dario bu Daniel Nyankopɔn no. Ɛyɛ Yehowa na ɔmaa Daniel tumi ma ɔhyɛɛ Babilon asehwe ho nkɔm. Na Onyankopɔn ama Daniel “honhom a ɛkyɛn so” a ɛma ɔda nsow wɔ abirɛmpɔn afoforo no ho. Ebia na Dario nim sɛ Onyankopɔn koro yi ara gyee Hebrifo mmerante baasa fii ogya a ɛrefram fononoo mu wɔ mfe pii 
... (8025 chars skipped) ...
o fi Aram kasa a wobetumi akyerɛ ase nso sɛ “watwiriw no mu.” Eyi si adwemmɔne a na Daniel atamfo no wɔ so dua.
DƐN NA WUHUI?
• Dɛn nti na Mediani Dario sii gyinae sɛ ɔbɛma Daniel dibea a ɛkorɔn?
• Pɔw bɔne bɛn na abirɛmpɔn ne amantam ahene no bɔe? Ɔkwan bɛn so na Yehowa gyee Daniel?
• Dɛn na wusua fii Daniel nokwaredi ho asɛm a wutiee no mu?

Laser tube mills ne laser welding akwan a ɛrenya nkɔanim no resakra sɛnea wɔyɛ tube ne paipu. Saa nneɛma foforo yi ma ɛyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ, ɛyɛ adwuma yiye, na ɛyɛ nsakrae a ɛso bi nni, na ɛde gyinapɛn foforo si hɔ wɔ adwuma no mu. Bere a laser mfiridwuma kɔ so nya nkɔso no, tumi a wobetumi de adi dwuma kɛse mpo wɔ tube ne paipu a wɔyɛ mu no reba. Hokwan a obi wɔ sɛ onya akwahosan (The right to health) ne sikasɛm (economic), asetra (social), ne amammerɛ mu hokwan (cultural right) a ɔwɔ sɛ wonya amansan nyinaa akwahosan gyinapɛn a ɛba fam koraa a ankorankoro nyinaa wɔ hokwan sɛ wonya. Potosí, a na wɔfrɛ no Villa Imperial de Potosí wɔ atubrafo bere so no yɛ ahenkurow ne Potosí Dwumadibea a ɛwɔ Bolivia no kuropɔn. Wɔakora kuropɔn no atubrafoɔ adansiɛ no fa kɛseɛ so wɔ kuropɔn no abakɔsɛm mu mfimfini, a - ne Cerro Rico de Potosí a ɛho hia wɔ wiase nyinaa - yɛ UNESCO Wiase Agyapadeɛ a wɔakyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ no fa.

Cerro Rico de Potosí a ɛwɔ Bolivia Tin Belt no ne dwetɛ a ɛdɔɔso sen biara wɔ wiase, na wɔatu fi afeha a ɛto so dunsia no mu, na ebedu 1996 no, na ɛyɛ tɔn 60,000. Akontaabu kyerɛ sɛ dwetɛ pii da so ara wɔ mmeae a wotu dwetɛ no. Potosí bɛyɛɛ kurow a ɛto so abien a ɛso sen biara, ne beae a wɔyɛɛ mint a edi kan no, wɔ Amerika. Eduu 1891 no, dwetɛ bo a ɛba fam no maa nsakrae baa tin a wotu mu, na ɛkɔɔ so kosii 1985 mu. Bere a wɔyɛɛ no kɛse wɔ afeha a ɛto so dunsia ne dunwɔtwe mu no, n
... (324 chars skipped) ...
shold, kurow no wim tebea trɛw nea ɛwɔ mmepɔw so wim tebea a ɛwɔ mmeae a osu tɔ na owia bɔ kɛse ( Cwc, sɛnea Köppen wim tebea nkyekyɛmu kyerɛ no ), a ɛwɔ po ase su ne alpine wim tebea (E). Awɔw bere mu yɛ nwini na ɛyɛ nsu na da biara da dodow a ɛkɔ soro no ntaa nkɔ soro nsen 20 °C, bere a awɔw bere mu no, nna a ɛyɛ nwini na anadwo a awɔw wom kɛse no yɛ −4 °C. Saa ɔhyew a ɛba fam yi fi osu a ɛtɔ kɛse wɔ awɔw bere mu asram no mu a ɔhyew a efi mu ba no ma ɔhyew mu nsakrae a ɛkɔ soro ba awiabere mu.

KRISTO NKYƐN KƆ
KRISTO NKYƐN KƆ
Emu Nsɛm
Nnianim
Nhoma yi din kyerɛ n’adwuma. Eyi Kristo adi sɛ nea Ne nkutoo tumi ma nea ɔkara hwehwɛ; na ɔkyere nea ogye akyinnye nan ne nea ogyina hɔ fa “asomdwoe kwan so.” Ɛkyere nea ɔhwehwe trenee akyi kwan nkakra-nkakra, ne Okristoni asetra mu kɔ nhyira a wohu wƆ wɔn ho a wɔde ahyɛ ɔdom ne ahotoso a enhinhim a egye nkwa, ne sɔhwɛ tumi a ɛyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo Adamfo no ase no mu. Nkyerɛkyerɛ a wohu wɔ saa nhoma yi mu yi de ahotɔ ne anidaso abrɛ akara a wɔabrɛ bebree, na aboa Owura no akyidifo bebree sɛ wɔnantew ahotoso ne anigye pii mu wɔ wɔn Nyame kwankyerɔfo no akyidi mu. ƐwƆ anidaso sɛ ɛde nkrasɛm koro no ara bɛma pii no ara a ehia wɔn ɔboa no. KN 5.1
“Ɛhɔ na ma ɔkwan no mpue,
Anamɔn a wotu kɔ soro.”
KN 5.2
Saa na ɛte WD Yakob ho, bere a ehu abrɛ nase, na bone atew no afi Onyankopɔn ho no, ɔhomee, “na ƆSOO dae, na hwɛ antweri si fam a natifi du soro.” Ɔsoro ne asase nkabom no woyi kyerɛɛ no, na nsɛm a ɛyɛ ahomeka ne anidaso no, Nea ɔte antweri no atrapoe nwini so no kasa kyerɛɛ no. KN 5.3
Ma ɔsoro aniso adehu no nti mu nkyerɛ pii no ara a wɔkan saa abasɛm a ɛde kɔ nkwa mu yi. KN 5.4
AKYERƐWFO.

HWƐ Kain ne Habel. Wɔayɛ mpanyimfo. Kain abɛyɛ okuafo. Oduadua awi, nnuaba ne afum nneɛma ahorow.
Na Habel abɛyɛ obi a ɔhwɛ nguan. Na ɔpɛ nguamma asɛm. Wonyin bɛyɛɛ nguan akɛse, enti ankyɛ na Habel benyaa nguan pii a ɔhwɛ wɔn.
Da koro Kain ne Habel de akyɛde brɛɛ Onyankopɔn. Kain de n’afum nnuan no bi bae. Na Habel de oguan a wadɔ sen biara a ɔwɔ no bae. Yehowa ani gyee Habel ne n’akyɛde no ho. Nanso n’ani annye Kain ne n’akyɛde no ho. Wunim nea enti?

ANANSE wɔ aniwa soronko bi a ɛboa no ma otumi hu baabi a ɛsɛ sɛ ohuruw si pɛpɛɛpɛ. Ɔkwan bɛn na ananse fa so yɛ eyi?
Susuw ho hwɛ: Nea ɛbɛyɛ na ananse atumi asusuw baabi a ogyina ne baabi a ɔpɛ sɛ ohuruw si pɛpɛɛpɛ no, ɔde n’aniwa akɛse abien a emu biara kesua no fomfam so anan no na ɛyɛ adwuma. Bere a n’ani kesua a ɛfomfam so no biako tumi hu hann yiye no, biako a ɛso yɛ wusii no ntumi nhu ade yiye. Sɛ enhu biribi yiye a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ dekode no bɛn no paa. Saa nokwasɛm yi na ɛboa ananse no ma otumi sẽsẽ hu ɔkwan a ɛda ɔne aboa a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔkyere no no ntam, ansa na wahuruw akyere no.
Nhwehwɛmufo pɛ sɛ wosua ɔkwan a ananse fa so kyere aboa, na ama wɔatumi ayɛ mfoninitwa afiri a wɔfrɛ no “3-D cameras” ne mpo robɔt ahorow a etumi susuw ɔkwan a ɛda nneɛma abien ntam. Sɛnea Intanɛt so dwumadibea a wɔfrɛ no “ScienceNOW” kyerɛ no, ananse aniwa no ma yehu “sɛnea mmoa a wosusua koraa a wɔn amemene kɛse nnu wansena de no tumi gyina nea wohu so yɛ ade.”
Wususuw ho dɛn? So ananse aniwa a ɛyɛ wusii a otumi de hu ade no nam adannandi so na ɛbae? Anaa wɔbɔe?

Baebolo Ne Bua Kɛ
Baebolo ne bua kɛ kyɛkyɛ! Amaneɛnwunlɛ ɛmboka Nyamenle adwenle mɔɔ ɔlɛ ye wɔ alesama anwo la anwo. Noko, mekɛ mɔɔ menli nwiɔ mɔɔ bɛlimoale bɛbɔle bɛ la kpole Nyamenle tumililɛ la bɛhilele kɛ bɛdabɛ a bɛbazi mɔɔ le kpalɛ nee ɛtane la anwo kpɔkɛ a. Bɛandie Nyamenle na ɛhye maanle bɛnwunle amaneɛ.
Bɛ kpɔkɛ ɛtane ne anwo amaneɛ a yɛlɛnwu ye ɛnɛ a. Yemɔti tɛ Nyamenle a vale amaneɛnwunlɛ rale.
Baebolo ne ka kɛ: “Saa awie kɔ ngyegyelɛ nu a ɔmmaka kɛ, ‘Nyamenle ɛlɛsɔ me anlea.’ Ɔluakɛ ɛtane ɛngola ɛnzɔ Nyamenle ɛnnea yɛɛ Nyamenle mumua ne ɛnzɔ awie biala ɛnnea.” (Gyemise 1:13) Awie biala kola nwu amaneɛ—bɛdabɛ mɔɔ Nyamenle kulo bɛ la bɔbɔ.

Yɛs. Ɛnibɔdi we na Jiova Witnɛs, na pɔsin we de prich—ivin di uman dɛn. Dɛn bin rayt na di Baybul se “bɔku [“uman dɛn,” NW] kin kɛr di nyuz go.”—Sam 68:11.
Uman dɛn we na Jiova Witnɛs dɛn de falamakata di gud uman dɛn we di Baybul bin tɔk bɔt. (Prɔvabs 31:10-31) Pan ɔl we dɛn nɔ kin de bifo na di kɔngrigeshɔn, dɛnsɛf kin jɔyn pan di prichin wok. Apat frɔm dat, dɛn de tich dɛn pikin bɔt di advays dɛn na di Baybul. (Prɔvabs 1:8) Uman dɛn we na Jiova Witnɛs dɛn kin ɛp ɔda pipul dɛn fɔ du gud bay wetin dɛn de tɔk ɛn wetin dɛn de du.—Taytɔs 2:3-5.

So Onyankopɔn Ahenni Wɔ Wo Komam?
Nnipa pii gye di sɛ asɛmmisa yi ho mmuae yɛ yiw. Sɛ nhwɛso no, The Catholic Encyclopedia ka sɛ: “Onyankopɔn ahenni kyerɛ sɛ . . . Onyankopɔn na odi yɛn koma so.” Asɔfo taa kyerɛkyerɛ saa. So Bible kyerɛkyerɛ ankasa sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni wɔ nnipa komam?
Ebinom susuw sɛ Yesu ankasa na odii kan hyɛɛ adwene a ɛne sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni wɔ nnipa komam no ho nkuran. Ɛyɛ ampa sɛ Yesu kae sɛ: “Onyankopɔn ahenni no wɔ mo mfinimfini.” (Luka 17:21) Bible

 bɔne fi ba: aguamansɛm, korɔnbɔ, awudisɛm, awaresɛe, adifudepɛ, [ne] amumɔyɛsɛm.” (Marko 7:20-22) Susuw ho hwɛ: So yɛrentumi nka sɛ esiane sɛ nnipa koma yɛ bɔne nti na nnɛ yehu amane pii wɔ wiase saa no? Enti ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Onyankopɔn Ahenni a edi mũ no afi baabi a ɛte saa aba? Nokwasɛm ne sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni ntumi mfi onipa komam mma sɛnea nsɔe ntumi nsow borɔdɔma no ara pɛ.—Mateo 7:16.
Nea ɛto so abien no, susuw nnipa a na Yesu rekasa akyerɛ wɔn bere a ɔkaa asɛm a ɛwɔ Luka 17:21 no ho hwɛ. Nky
... (682 chars skipped) ...
aw no sɛ ɔbɛyɛ Ahenni no so Hene. Sɛ́ Ɔhene a Wɔapaw no no, na Yesu wɔ saa nkurɔfo no mfinimfini pɛɛ. Ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni no ho asɛm, na ɔyɛɛ anwonwade mpo. Eyi ma wohuu nea saa Ahenni no bɛyɛ daakye ho biribi. Ɛnde, ɛyɛ ampa paa sɛ na Ahenni no wɔ wɔn mfinimfini.
Ɛda adi pefee sɛ Kyerɛwnsɛm biara nni hɔ a ɛfoa adwene a ɛne sɛ Onyankopɔn Ahenni wɔ nnipa komam no so. Mmom no, ɛyɛ aban ankasa a ɛde nsakrae akɛse bɛba asase so sɛnea adiyifo no hyɛɛ ho nkɔm no.—Yesaia 9:6, 7; Daniel 2:44.

Neazo Eku ne le Kilisienema ekpunli ekyii bie mɔɔ bɛnyi sunsum nu na bɛfa adehilelɛ bɛmaa Gyihova Alasevolɛ mɔɔ wɔ ewiade amuala la. Bɛ gyima ne gua ye ngakyile nwiɔ:
Bɛdua mbuluku nee vidio, ayia nee sukulu ngakyile zo bɛfa adehilelɛ mɔɔ gyi Baebolo ne azo la bɛmaa Gyihova Alasevolɛ.
—Luku 12:42. Bɛnea Gyihova Alasevolɛ ewiade amuala gyima ne azo na bɛfa adehilelɛ bɛmaa wɔ daselɛlilɛ gyima ne anwo. Eza bɛnea ninyɛne mɔɔ menli fi bɛ ahonle nu fa maa la azo.

Gyimayɛvoma Kɔmatii: Bɛyɛ ngyehyɛleɛ bɛmaa Bɛtɛle mbusua mɔɔ wɔ ewiade amuala la.

Oti Asubɔnten no bɛyɛ kilomita 520 (323) na ɛwɔ hɔ mi) tenten. Ne ti wɔ Benin ne Burkina Faso, ɛsen fa Benin ne Togo na ɛka Volta Asubɔnten ho wɔ Ghana. Nsubɔnten a ɛwɔ benkum fam mpoano wɔ Togo no fi Togo Mmepɔw a ɛwɔ anafo fam no so. N’apuei fam nsubɔnte
... (368 chars skipped) ... 
lery kwae a nsu yiri fi hɔ bere ne bere mu wɔ hɔ. Ɔpɛ bere a ɛwɔ ha no fi bɛyɛ November kosi April, na Harmattan mframa a ɛyɛ hyew a ɛyɛ kusuu fi atifi fam bɔ. Wɔ afe no mu bere yi mu no, asubɔnten no mu nsu sua koraa. Oti ne Koumongou nyinaa wɔ mmeae a nsuyiri tɔ, bɛyɛ kilomita du (10) ne enan (4) (6.2 ne 2.5 mi) trɛw sɛnea ɛte biara. Vietnam
Vietnam yɛ ɔman bi a ɛnteaseɛ ne sie koro no ase pɛpɛɛpɛ. Ɛyɛ afiase Afrika ne Ahyiafo koro no ase. Esiane ɔman yi, China bɛto aplaa ase, Laos ne Cambodia bɛkoro na mmepɔw ase ne esum South China Sea bɛba ase. Nkɔso, Krataa Hanoi de ne tɛteɛtɛ me kɔhɔ ne yɛ tete teɛte me din deɛ Vietnamese no nko hɔ. Kaasekufoɔ no din deɛ Vietnamese dong. Vietnam de kaasekufoɔ no bae 97 miliɔn ho.  kaa mprenpren krataa a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔa 'regista' wɔ Efiada Ɔgyefoɔ bosome da ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa wɔ mfeɛ mpem mmienu ne du-mmienu mu. Amanyɔkuo yi yɛɛ ne Nhyiamudie kɛseɛ deɛ ɛdikan wɔ Ɔgyefoɔ bosome da ɛtɔ so aduonu- num wɔ mfeɛ mpem mmienu ne du-mmienu a, ɛkɔɔ so wɔ Nkran Agoprama so (Accra Sports Stadium). Enti berɛ bi bɛba a wiase nyinaa bɛnya aban baako?
Sɛ aban baako na ɛdi wiase nyinaa so a, hwɛ sɛnea anka nnipa bɛnya ahotɔ. Ɛnnɛ ebinom di yie paa, nanso nnipa pii na ohia nti, wɔrehunu amane. Nanso aban a ɛdwene ne manfoɔ ho deɛ, ɛbɛtumi ama obiara nsa aka nea ɔhia. Wohwɛ a nnipa bɛtumi de aban a ɛte saa aba asase so?
Ɛfiri tete nyinaa, nnipa aban adi nkoguo. Wɔntumi mmaa wɔn a wɔdi wɔn so no nsa nkaa nea wɔhia; wɔn a wɔn ho taa ka mu paa ne ahiafoɔ. Aban no bi di atirimɔdensɛm. (Ɔsɛnkafoɔ 4:1; 8:9) Nanso adeɛ nyinaa so Tumfoɔ Nyankopɔn no ahyɛ bɔ sɛ, ɔbɛma aban bi abɛsi aban a ɛwɔ wiase nyinaa ananmu. Nea ɔbɛdi saa aban no so no bɛhwɛ ne manfoɔ yie paa.
Dɛn na Onyankopɔn Ahennie bɛyɛ?
Yehowa Nyankopɔn ayi obi a ɔfata paa sɛ ɔnni wiase so hene. Ne Ba Yesu ne saa Ɔhene no. (Luka 1:31-33) Berɛ a Yesu wɔ asase so no, na ɔtaa boa nkurɔfoɔ. Sɛ ɔbɛdi asase so hene a, ɔbɛka nnipa a wɔfiri aman nyinaa so abom, na ɔbɛyi amanehunu nyinaa afiri wɔn so.
Nnipa nyinaa na wɔbɛgye Yesu atom sɛ Ɔhene anaa? Dabi. Nanso, Yehowa wɔ aboterɛ. (2 Petro 3:9) Wama nnipa anya hokwan a wɔde bɛgye Yesu atom sɛ Ɔhene. Ɛrenkyɛ, Yesu bɛyi nnipa abɔnefoɔ afiri asase so, na ɔbɛma nnipa a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa anya asomdwoeɛ ne akomatɔyam.

Elizabeth Afoley Quaye (wɔwoo no afe 1970), mprempren ɔyɛ Mmarahyɛbadwa no mu ni ma Krowor mmansini a ɛwɔ Nkran punpuni (Greater Accra ) mantam mu wɔ Ghana no. Ɔsan nso yɛ ɔsoafoɔ a ɔhwɛ Mpataayie, afarefodwuma, ne Nsuo mu Nneɛma ho nsɛm so.[1]
Elizabeth wɔ Bachelor of Science abɔdin krataa wɔ (Agribusiness) mu wɔ Central University College. Ɔnyaa (National Diploma )wɔ (General Agriculture) mu wɔ Ghana Suapɔn mu, na ɔsan nso nyaa adansedie krataa wɔ General Agriculture mu wɔ Kwadaso Agricultural
... (1139 chars skipped) ... 
ɛ amanyɔkuo (National Democratic Congress-NDC), Hugo Kofi Huppenbauer a ɔfiri (Progressive People’s Party-PPP) ne Amartey Fanny a oɔfiri (Convention People’s Party-CPP) mu. Afoley Quaye dii nkonim wɔ abatoɔ no mu a ɔnyaa mma mpem Aduasa-mmienu, Ahanan ne aduosia nsia (32,463) wɔ mpem aduosia mmeɛnsa, ahanum ne aduonum-num (63,555) a wɔtoeɛ no mu, a ɛgyina hɔ ma ɔha nkyekyem aduonum-baako ne akyiri pɔ whee ne nwɔtwe (51.08).[4]

1巴比倫王伯沙撒元年,但以理在床上做了一個夢,腦中出現了異象,便把夢記錄下來,講述其中的大意. 2但以理說:「我在夜間的異象中看見天風四面吹來,攪動大海. 3接著,四隻巨獸從海中上來,各有不同的形狀. 4第一隻獸像獅子,但有鷹的翅膀.我觀看時,見牠的翅膀被拔掉.牠被扶起來,像人一樣雙腳站在地上,並被賦予人的頭腦. 5第二隻獸像熊,用兩隻後腿站立,牙齒間叼著三根肋骨,有聲音對牠說,『起來,多吞吃肉吧!』
6「此後,我繼續觀看,見還有一隻獸像豹,背上有四個如鳥翼般的翅膀.這獸有四個頭,並被賦予權柄. 7此後,我在夜間的異象中看見第四隻獸,恐怖可怕,極其強壯,用大鐵牙吞吃,咬碎獵物,用腳踐踏所剩的.這獸與前三隻獸不同,牠有十個角. 8我觀看這些角時,見其中長出一個小角,先前的角中有三個被連根拔出,讓它取而代之.這小角有人的眼睛和說狂言的口.
9「我看見寶座已設立,

Dɛn ne Mmere mu Nsakrae ne Mmere mu Nsɛnkyerɛnne a Wɔde Ɔkwan a Wɔfa so Yɛ Nkyɛmu a Ɛnyɛ Den Di Dwuma? What Are Seasonal Fluctuations And Seasonal Indices Using The Method Of Simple Averages in Akan
Mmere mu nsakrae ne mmere mu nkyerɛkyerɛmu yɛ nsusuwii ahorow a ɛho hia wɔ sikasɛm ne sikasɛm wiase. Ɛdenam ɔkwan a wɔfa so yɛ nkyɛmu a ɛnyɛ den a wɔde bedi dwuma so no, wobetumi anya nhumu wɔ sɛnea mmere mu nsakrae ne mmere mu nkyerɛkyerɛmu ahorow te ho. Saa asɛm yi bɛhwehwɛ adwene a ɛfa mmere mu ns
... (6901 chars skipped) ... 
o no bi ne bere nhyehyɛe mu nhwehwɛmu, linear regression, ne moving averages. Bere nhyehyɛe nhwehwɛmu hwɛ nsɛm a wɔde ama no wɔ bere bi mu de hu nhwɛso ne nneɛma a ɛkɔ so. Wɔde linear regression di dwuma de kyerɛ abusuabɔ a ɛda nneɛma abien a ɛsakra ntam, bere a moving averages ma data no yɛ mmerɛw de kyerɛ nneɛma a ɛrekɔ so. Wobetumi de akwan yi nyinaa adi dwuma de anya nsɛm a ɛsakrasakra wɔ mmere horow mu ho ntease pa.

Mmere mu nsakrae ne indices yɛ ade titiriw a ɛma yɛte sikasɛm tebea ase. Bere a mfiridwuma renya nkɔso no, saa ara na nnwinnade a ɛwɔ hɔ a wɔde bedi nsakrae ahorow yi akyi na wɔayɛ mu nhwehwɛmu no nso renya nkɔso. Daakye, yebetumi ahwɛ kwan sɛ yebehu akwan a ɛyɛ nwonwa a wɔfa so boaboa nsɛm ano na wɔhwehwɛ mu, na ama wɔatumi ahyɛ mmere mu nsɛm ho nkɔm pɛpɛɛpɛ.

le kpalɛ tɛla ngɛsanloma. Sonla le Nyamenle abɔdeɛ mɔɔ wɔ azɛlɛ ye azo la anu titili, ɔbɔle sonla kɛ ye “ɛsaso,” na bɛkola bɛnyia ye subane ne mɔ mɔɔ yɛ nwanwane la bie na bɛda bɛ ali.—Mɔlebɛbo 1:26, 27.

wie biala mɔɔ kɛnyia diedi wɔ ye nu la bɛanzɛkye ye na yeanyia dahuu ngoane.”—Dwɔn 3:16.

Alexander Ransford Ababio yɛ Ghana ɔmanyɛnyi na nkan mbrahyɛbaguanyi dze ma "Dayi South" ambatow mpasua do a ɔwɔ Firaw Mantɔw mu wɔ Ghana wɔ mbrahyɛbagua a odzi kan na ma ɔtɔ do ebien wɔ "4th Republic" wɔ Ghana amanyɛsɛm mu.
Wɔwoo Alexander Ransford Ababio wɔ Mumu bosoom da ɔtɔ do eduonu esuon wɔ mfe apem ahankron eduonu esuon mu wɔ Firaw Mantɔw mu. Okosua eduryɛ(medicine) ho nyimdzi wɔ Mission House College ma onyaa abɔdzin krataa a ɔyɛ Bachelor Of Science, ekyir no ɔkɔ toaa no skuul do wɔ Saar
... (195 chars skipped) ... 
ahyɛbagua mu odzi kan wɔ "4th Republic" mu. Ɔsan so gyina maa South Dayi ambatow mpasua wɔ mbrahyɛbagua a ɔtɔ ebien wɔ "4th Republic" mu wɔ Ghana amba a wɔtoo no wɔ mfe apem ahankron eduokron esia no mu. Wɔsan too maa no bio dɛ mbrahyɛbaguanyi a ogyina NDC amanyikuw n'ananmu. Ɔno nye nyimpa a ogyinae maa dɛm ambatow mpasua no wɔ mbrahyɛbagua fie odzi kan wɔ "4th Republic" mu. Ababio gyae n'egua no mu maa Daniel K. Ampofo a ɔno so yɛ NDC amanyɛkuw ba wɔ mfe mpem ebien ambatow no mu.
Ababio nyaa a

Barney Kodzo Agbo a ogyina mu ma NPP amanyɛkuw no so nyaa ɔha nkyekyɛmu esia na n'ekyir pɔw eduowɔtwe a ɔyɛ apem kor ahawɔtwe na eduokron awɔtwe na Akudeka Victor Kofi a ogyina PNC amanyɛkuw ananmu no nyaa ɔha nkyekyɛmu kor ekyir pɔw eduana a ɔyɛ ahaebiasa na eduowɔtwe amba dodow.

Dwom 60
Dawid “Miktam” dwom. Wɔde yɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ. Ɔtoo no bere a ɔne Aram Naharanfo ne Aram Zobafo koe na Yoab san kokum Edomfo mpem dumien wɔ Nkyene Bon mu no.
1 Onyankopɔn, woapo yɛn, woabɔ yɛn agu;
wo bo afuw yɛn, nanso gye yɛn bio!
2 Woawosow asase no na woapae mu;
toatoa nea abubu no, efisɛ ɛrehinhim.
3 Woama wo nkurɔfo ahu mmere bɔne;
woama yɛn nsa a ɛma yɛtɔ ntintan.
4 Nanso wɔn a wosuro wo de, woama wɔn frankaa so
sɛ wontu ntia agyan no.
5 Gye yɛn nkwa na fa wo nsa nifa boa yɛn,
na ama wɔn a wodɔ wɔn no anya nkwa.
6 Onyankopɔn akasa afi ne kronkronbea se,
“Nkonim mu, mɛkyɛ Sekem mu,
na masusuw Sukot bon no.
7 Gilead yɛ me de; Manase nso saa ara;
Efraim yɛ me dade kyɛw,
Yuda yɛ mʼahempema.
8 Moab yɛ me guasɛn,
Edom so na metow me mpaboa gu;
na meteɛ mu nkonimdi so gu Filistifo so.”
9 Hena na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuropɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban no mu?
Hena na obedi mʼanim akɔ Edom?
10 Onyankopɔn, ɛnyɛ wo na woapo yɛn
na wo ne yɛn asraafo nkɔ ɔsa bio ana?
11 Boa yɛn tia ɔtamfo no,
na ɔdesani mmoa nka hwee.
12 Onyankopɔn wɔ yɛn afa yi, yebedi nkonim,
na obetiatia yɛn atamfo so.
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfo. Wɔde sanku na ɛto.

Río Plátano Bisophere Korabea
Río Plátano Bisophere Korabea yɛ 5,250 kasaase a wɔdze esie wɔ La Mosquitmantew a ɔwɔ he Caribbempoano a ɔwɔ Hondura Asaase obebree na twa mu wɔ he Río PlátanƐpɔw na wɔ mboa dodow bia suro hɔn nna bi nso yɛ Hondura ɔyɛ Ɛpɔw no kese. Woayɛ wiase amanbra bea na hen pɔw fir ce 198 Wɔ 2011, UNESCO dze sɔw no tow wiase amanbra a ɔwɔ fonamu krataa do.

den sɛ wɔbɛma Pechfo kuayɛ nketewa no ayɛ nea ɛbɛkɔ do
o atra hɔ daa. Kuw a ɛsõ sen biara no mu pii, ladino, fi anwafo fam hyɛn mmoa a wɔkora wɔn so no mu.[3] Asase hokwan ahorow ho ntawntawdi yɛ ade titiriw a ɛde ntawntawdi ba mmusuakuw ahorow ntam. Mprempren ntawntawdi a ɛfa asase hokwan ahorow ho no fa nnipa a wɔnyɛ kurom hɔfo a wɔtow hyɛ aborɔfo asase wuranom so na wohunahuna wɔn—a wɔhyɛ wɔn ma wofi wɔn abakɔsɛm mu nsase so.

Nhyehyɛe a ɛfa nneɛma a wɔkora so no bisa sɛ wɔnkɔ so mfa wɔn ho nhyɛ mu sɛ wɔbɛma asase a wɔwɔ wɔ beae a wɔakora so no ne ne mpɔtam no mu ada hɔ. Menli mɔtwɛ pɛ a pɛle Azuyilɛ ne a, noko mekɛ hɔle bie la bɛ nwo zonle bɛyɛle apenle apenle dɔɔnwo. Na, Azuyilɛ ne anzi ɛvolɛ 352, bɛwole Ebileham. Yɛnwu kɛ Nyamenle zile lile ye ɛwɔkɛ zo manle Ebileham wole ralɛ nrenya mɔɔ bɛfɛlɛ ye Ayezeke la. Akee, wɔ Ayezeke amra mrenya nwiɔ ne anu, Nyamenle kpale nu yele Gyekɔbo.
Gyekɔbo nyianle abusua kpole mɔɔ mralɛ mrenya 12 yɛɛ mralɛ mraalɛ noko wɔ nu a. Gyekɔbo amra mrenya 10 ne kpɔle bɛ diema kakula Dwosefi na bɛdɔnenle ye bɛhɔle Yigyibiti akɛlɛzonlenlɛ nu. Amozii, Dwosefi rayɛle tumivolɛ mɔɔ anwo hyia kpalɛ la wɔ Yigyibiti. Mekɛ mɔɔ ɛhɔne kpole bie rale la, Dwosefi zɔle ɔ mediema ne mɔ nleanle kɛ bɛnyia adwenle nzenzaleɛ a. Awieleɛ kolaa ne, Gyekɔbo abusua ne amuala, Yizilayɛma ne, dule hɔle Yigyibiti. Bɛwole Ebileham ɔ nzi ɛvolɛ 290 kolaa na ɛhye azi.
Wɔ ɛvolɛ 215 mɔɔ doale ye la anu, Yizilayɛma ne dɛnlanle Yigyibiti. Wɔ Dwosefi ewule nzi, bɛrayɛle ngɛkɛlɛ wɔ ɛkɛ. Mekɛ hɔle bie la, bɛwole Mosisi, na Nyamenle luale ɔ nwo zo liele Yizilayɛma vile Yigyibiti. Wɔ ɔ muala anu, ɛvolɛ 857 anu tetedwɛkɛ a wɔ Foa NWIƆ ne anu a.

Ɔkwan Bɛn so na Adwempa Betumi Abɔ Wo Ho Ban?
SƐ WOHWƐ sɛnea asorɔkye bɔ kɔ soro no a, ɛyɛ fɛ, nanso wɔ hyɛn mu adwumayɛfo fam de ɛkyerɛ asiane. Saa nsu a ɛreyiri no betumi ama wɔahwere wɔn nkwa.
Saa ara na Onyankopɔn asomfo nso betumi ahyia nhyɛso ahorow a ebetumi abunkam wɔn so. Ebia woahu sɛ ɔtaa ne sɔhwɛ ahorow ba Kristofo so ntoatoaso na ɛhyɛ wɔn so. Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ esiane sɛ wompɛ sɛ wugu asu wɔ honhom fam nti, wopɛ sɛ woko tia denneennen. (1 Timoteo 1:19) Adwempa a wubenya no bet
... (4992 chars skipped) ... 
no ho hia sen sɛ obenya nnipa anim dom. (2 Korintofo 10:10-18) Su a ɛte saa a yebenya no bɛboa yɛn ma yɛrempɛ ntɛm nyɛ ade bere a obi ahyɛ yɛn abufuw no.

Suaman (pronounciation of Suaman (help·info)) yɛ mpesua no mu baako a ɛwɔ Ghana mmarahyɛbedwam. Wɔyii mmarahyɛbedwani baako a ne din wɔ abatoɔ nkrataa no mu a ɔgyina hɔ ma saa mpesua no. Suaman wɔ Aowin/Suaman mansini a ɛwɔ atifi atɔeɛ mantam wɔ Ghana.[1] Suaman abatoɔ mpesua no yɛ abatoɔ mpesua nkron a ɛwɔ Western North mantam no mu wɔ Ghana.[2][3][4] Nkane no na wɔhyɛ Aowin/Suaman abatoɔ mpesua no mu. Akakuo Mmepɔ anaa Tadrart Akakus ( Arabic / ALA-LC : Tadrārt Akākūs ) yɛ mmepɔw bi a ɛwɔ Ghat Mantam sare so wɔ Libya atɔe fam, Sahara fa bi . Wɔwɔ Ghat kurow a ɛwɔ Libya, no apuei fam, na efi Algeria hye so kɔ atifi fam, bɛyɛ 100 kilometres (62 mi) . Mpɔtam hɔ wɔ abotan so adwinni ahorow a ɛdɔɔso titiriw a edii abakɔsɛm anim .

Tadrart yɛ ɔbea kwan a wɔfa so yɛ "bepɔw" wɔ Berber kasa ahorow mu (ɔbarima: adrar ).

Daily Manna is a daily Bible devotional service provided by Biblica. The Scripture is provided in many forms and is new every day. It is a great way to receive the encouragement and hope found in the Word of God.
Romafoɔ 5:1-5
Afei a ɛnam gyidie so ama Onyankopɔn abu yɛn bem no, yɛnam Awurade Yesu Kristo so anya Onyankopɔn asomdwoeɛ. Ɔnam gyidie so de yɛn aba Onyankopɔn adom a yɛte mu seesei no mu. Yɛn ani gye wɔ anidasoɔ mu sɛ yɛbɛnya Onyankopɔn anim animuonyam. Afei, yɛn haw mu nso, yɛn ani gye, ɛfiri sɛ, yɛnim sɛ ɔhaw de boasetɔ ba, na boasetɔ de osuahunu ba, ɛnna osuahunu de anidasoɔ ba. Saa anidasoɔ yi renni yɛn hwammɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn nam Honhom Kronkron a ɛyɛ nʼakyɛdeɛ a ɔde ama yɛn no so ahwie ne dɔ agu yɛn akoma mu.

Wubetumi ahyehyɛ mmara a ɛfata ama wo babun. Nanso, nea edi kan no, ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu nea enti a ɛyɛ den ma no sɛ obedi wo mmara so no.

Nhoma bi ka sɛ, “Sɛ awofo hyehyɛ mmara a ɛfata ma mmabun na mmofra no hu sɛ awofo no ani wɔ wɔn so a, wɔntaa mfa wɔn ho nhyɛ nneyɛe bɔne mu.” (Letting Go With Love and Confidence) Nanso, sɛ awofo bu wɔn ani gu wɔn mma so na wɔma wɔn ahofadi pii a, ɛma mmofra no nya adwene sɛ wɔn ho asɛm nhia wɔn. - Wɔatwerɛ nsɛm wei ɛwɔ Asante kasa mu
Abraham Kofi Asante yɛ Ghanani amanyɔni a na ɔyɛ mmarahyɛbadwani wɔ mmarahyɛbadwafie a na ɛtɔ so mmienu ne mmiɛnsa wɔ Ghana Adehyeman a ɛtɔ so nnan mu.[1] Na ɔyɛ mmarahyɛbadwani ma Amenfi West mpasua no wɔ Atoeɛ mantam a na ogyina mu ma Kyiniiɛ amanyɔkuo no (NDC) wɔ Ghana.[2]
Abrabɔ ahyeaseɛ ne sukuu[sesa]
Asante kɔɔ ne ntoasoɔ sukuu wɔ Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology Suapɔn. Onyaa abɔdini krataa wɔ 'Bachelor of Science degree in chemistry' mu wɔ suapɔn korɔ no ara mu. Ɔsane nso kɔɔ University of Ghana suapɔn ɛhɔ na ɔkɔ nyaa abɔdin krataa a brɔfo kasa mu yɛfrɛ no 'Master of Business Administration'. Afei nso ɔsan kɔ nyaa abɔdin krataa a yɛfrɛ no Master of Science wɔ brɔfo kasa mu wɔ Ghana Telecom University College suapɔn.
Amanyɔsɛm[sesa]
Asante kɔɔ mmarahyɛbadwafie a na ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa wɔ Ghana Adehyeman a ɛtɔ so nnan mu. Na Ɔyɛ Kyiniiɛ amanyɔkuo ananmusini ma Amenfi West mpasua wɔ Atoeɛ mantam wɔ Ghana. N'amanyɔkuo abrabɔ no hyɛɛ aseɛ firii ɛbrɛ a onyaa afe apem aha-nkron aduokron nsia (1996) abatoɔ kɛseɛ no maa NDC amanyɔkuo no. Onyaa mma 16,085 firii 24,396 a ɛkyerɛ ɔha nkyekyemu 46.70%. NÁ GOLIAT KƐSE TE DƐN?
Kyerɛwtohɔ a ɛwɔ 1 Samuel 17:4-7 no ka sɛ na Goliat tenten boro basafa asia—ɛboro anammɔn akron. Nea ɛma yehu Filistini yi kɛse ne n’ahoɔden ne kɔbere akotade a na ɔhyɛ no. Sɛ wɔde si nsenia so a, na emu duru boro semɛnte kotoku biako! Ná dua a ne peaw hyɛ ano no te sɛ mpuran, na na peaw no ankasa mu duru te sɛ akuma a wɔde pae gya. Ná ebetumi aba sɛ Goliat akode nkutoo mu yɛ duru sen Dawid!

Yehowa Adansefo a wɔwɔ hɔ nnɛ no, wɔn som no fii ase bɛboro mfe 130 ni. Mfiase no, Bible asuafo kakraa bi a na wɔte Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania wɔ United States tɔɔ wɔn bo yɛɛ Bible mu nhwehwɛmu kɔɔ akyiri. Wɔde nneɛma a na asɔre ahorow kyerɛkyerɛ no totoo nea Bible kyerɛkyerɛ ankasa ho. Afei nea wosuae no, wofii ase de bi kɔɔ nhoma ne atesɛm nkrataa mu, na wɔde bi nso yɛɛ nhoma a wɔato din Ɔwɛn-Aban—Ɛka Yehowa Ahenni Kyerɛ.
Bible asuafo anokwafo yi mu biako ne ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛ no Charles Taze Russell. Bible adesua a na wɔreyɛ no, Russell na na odi wɔn anim; ɔno ara nso na odii anim ma wɔyɛɛ Ɔwɛn-Aban no, nanso ɛnyɛ sɛ na wakɔfa ɔsom foforo aba. Saa bere no, na wɔfrɛ wɔn Bible Asuafo; nea na esi Russell ne wɔn a aka no ani so ne sɛ wɔbɛboa nkurɔfo ama wɔahu Yesu Kristo nkyerɛkyerɛ. Afei nso na wɔpɛ sɛ wodi Kristofo a wɔtenaa ase asomafo no bere so no anammɔn akyi. Yesu Kristo na ɔde Kristosom bae, enti yebu no sɛ ɔno na ɔde yɛn som no bae.—Kolosefo 1:18-20.

ahotoso a enhinhim, ne adwumayɛ a ɛso bi nni. Kɔkra mprempren na fi karka akwantu a wɔde nea ɛkyɛn so kyerɛkyerɛ mu ase.

Nnora yɛsuaa afa mmoa a wɔte nsuo ase. Yɛsuaa afa nsuomnam a wɔn mu bebree wɔ hɔ na deɛ wɔwe nsuomnam na wɔba nkabom sɛ wɔwe wɔn nyinaa, te sɛ nnomaa a wɔdware asuo, bonsu, ne nsuomnam akɛseɛ akɛseɛ.
Afei yɛsuaa afa gyata ho. Berɛ a osuo na ɛba bɛtɔ no, mframa bɔ na obobiri rentumi nte sɛ ɔba. Nti ɛnyɛ den sɛ gyata kye no.
Nso, sakraman wɔ hɔ a ɛte sɛ ɔsɔ a wɔte Zambia mu. Wɔn honam yɛ ankaahono na wɔn nam no a wɔyɛ mmoa a wɔte asaase ase na wɔtumi hu wɔn yie. Nti gye sɛ wɔhwɛhwɛ kwan a wɔtumi kye wɔn. Wɔtaa tu amuna anaa wɔ hu mframa wɔ tokuro no mu akye wɔn aduane. Afei nso sakraman nante brɛoo sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a mmoa nketewa rente sɛ wɔba. (wɔn ntumi nhu yie.) Afei nso mmoa no bi na wɔnante akyiri dodo firi wɔn tokuro na sakraman no kye wɔn.
Ntetea a wɔte anweatam nso wɔ hɔ. Berɛ a mmoa no nyinaa kɔ hinta wɔ baabi sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a owia mmɔ wɔ wɔn so no, ntetea na wɔba sɛ wɔde mmoawa a wɔawu de aba fie. Nanso mmoawa bi wɔ hɔ a wɔn nso wɔpɛ sɛ wɔwe ntetea no te sɛ ananse ne mmoawa afoforɔ. Afei nso mframa bɔ a, ɛde ntetea no kɔ.
Nanso wei nyinaa akyi no wɔduru wɔn fie na wɔwɔ aduane ama ntetea kuo no nyinaa.
Afei mfɔteɛ wɔ hɔ na wɔkyɛ mfeɛ enum ansa na wɔsi wɔn fie wie no. Wɔ wie no na mfɔteɛ nketewa ba na wɔnyini wie no na wɔ fi ase tu kɔ wiem. Afei, mmoawa bi wɔ hɔ a wɔ ba mfɔteɛ dan no abɔnten na wɔhyerɛn kanea. Wɔyɛ saa no na mfɔteɛ ba wɔn hɔ ɛfiri sɛ wɔpɛ kanea. Ɛno akyi saa mmoawa na wɔkye wɔn we.

- Wɔatwerɛ nsɛm wei ɛwɔ Asante kasa mu
Nasa yɛ akurase bi a ɛwɔ Ghana wɔ abakɔsɛm ahennie wɔ Wala a ɛwɔ mprenpren atifido atɔeɛ mantam wɔ Ghana.Ɛyɛ brɔfo kwansin dunan wɔ atifi atɔeɛ wɔ Wa, Ghana. Wɔ afe apem ahannwɔtwe ne aduowɔtwe nson de kɔpem afe apem ahannwɔtwe ne aduowɔtwe nnwɔtwe ɔpɛ berɛ mu no, na Nasa yɛ kuro a ɛdi mu pa ara. Ɔpɛ berɛ no mu no Zabarima a ɛhyɛ Babatu ase ahokwka ne asoɔkyee no nti ɛseɛ kuro no. Saa atoyerɛnkyɛm yi maa wɔhweree nnipa bebree ɛna ɛgyaa ɛfii ne prɔka wɔ kuro no agya. Adan ahodoɔ a Babatu asoɔkyee seɛ no bi ne Nkramofo asɔredan a ɛwɔ kurom hɔ. Na nnipa dodoɔ a ɛwɔ Nasa wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduasa baako yɛ ɔha ne aduanan nkron. Wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduanan nwɔtwe mu no nnipa dodoɔ a na ɛwɔ hɔ yɛ ahanu ne aduonwɔtwe nkron. Wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduosia nnipa akenkan mu no ɔnyaa nnipa ɔha ne
aduasa nsi wɔ afe apem ahankron ne aduoson mu no na nnipa a wɔte kurom hɔ no dodoɔ yɛ ahanu ne du nsia.a.

Gladys Nortey Ashitey
- Wɔakyerɛw nsɛm yi wɔ Akuapem kasa mu
Gladys Nortey Ashitey (wɔ woo no November da etɔ so 21, afe 1955) yɛ Ghanani amanyɔni ne mmarahyɛbadwani wɔ mmarahyɛbedwa a ɛtɔ so nnan wɔ Ghana adehyeman a ɛtɔ so nnan no mu, a na ogyina hɔ ma Ledzokuku abatoɔ mpɛsoa so wɔ Nkran Mantam mu wɔ Ghana.
Ne mmɔfrase ne Nhomsua[sesa]
Wɔ woo Ashitey wɔ Ledzokuku a ɛwɔ Nkran Mantam mu a ɛwɔ Ghana wɔ November a ɛtɔ so 21, afe 1955. ɔkoo suapɔn a ɛne American University of the Caribbean ma no nyaa abodin krataa wɔ nnuroyɛ mu. ɔsan nso kɔɔ Suapɔn a ɛne University of Ghana konyaa nimdeɛ ne abɔdin wɔ nnuroyɛ mu.
Amanyɔsɛm[sesa]
Wodikan paw Ahitey sɛ mmarahyɛ badwani wɔ amanyɔkuo New Patriotic Party din mu wɔ December 2004 abatoɔ a ɛkɔɔ so no mu sɛ mmarhyɛ badwani a ogyinaa hɔ ma Ledzokuku abatoɔ mpɛsoa so wɔ Nkran Mantam mu wɔ Ghana.Onyaa mma a ne dodoɔ yɛ 76,674 no mu 33,039 a egyina hɔ ma ɔha mu nkykyɛmu 43.10%. Nii Nortey Dua a ogyinaa wɔ amanyokuo National Democratic Congress din mu no dii ne so nkunim wɔ abatoɔ a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ afe 2008 no mu. Eyi maa no som penkro sɛ mmarahyɛ badwani.arian.
Nnwuma[sesa]
Ashittey yɛ ɔyaresafoɔ ne kane mmarahyɛ badwani a ogyina hɔ ma Lezdokuku abatoɔ mpɛsoa so wɔ Nkran Mantam wɔ Ghana

Yawoada(pronounciation of "Yawoada" (help·info)) yɛ da a ɛtɔ so num wɔ nnawɔtwe no mu. Yawoada hyɛ Wukuada ne Efiada ntam.[1] Deɛ IOS 8601 ɛkyerɛ ne sɛ Yawoada yɛ tɔ so ɛnan ɛwɔ nawɔtwe ne mu. Ɔman a wɔde Kwasiada dikan wɔ nanwɔtwe no mu no, ɛyɛ da a ɛtɔ so num wɔ nanwɔtwe no mu.
Sɛdeɛ Akanfoɔ dodoɔ no ara frɛ ɛda Yawoada ne din a wɔn de ma mmɛrima ne mmaa wɔ saa da yi muSesa
Nea Yawoada kyerɛ ɛne ne KradinSesa
Yawoada yɛ da a wɔbɔɔ asase na ne kradin ne Yaw ma barima ne Yaa ma ɔbaa.[1]

1. Ɔkwan bɛn so na nkɔmmɔ ama ebinom aware asɔ?
ONUA bi a ɔwɔ Canada kae sɛ: “M’ani nka obiara ho sɛ me yere.” Ɔde kaa ho sɛ, “Sɛ me yere wɔ me nkyɛn a, na me ho abae me, na me haw so atew.” Ɔbarima bi a ɔwɔ Australia kyerɛw sɛ: “Me ne me yere atena mfe 11 ni, nanso da koro mpo ntwaam a me ne no nkasae. Yɛn mu biara gye ne yɔnko di, na yensuro sɛ yɛn aware begu. Eyi nyinaa amma kwa. Asɛm no ara ne sɛ yegye

awarefo betumi ayɛ ma wɔn dɔ mu ayɛ den?
9 Su a ehia wɔ aware mu paa ne ɔdɔ. Bible ka sɛ “ɛyɛ koroyɛ hama a ɛyɛ pɛ.” (Kol. 3:14) Ɔdɔ kann nsa da, enyin. Anigye mu oo, ahohia mu oo, sɛ awarefo bom yɛ ade a, na wɔn dɔ ara na ɛrenyin no. Eyi ma wɔbɛyɛ nnamfo paa, na sɛ obi anhu ne yɔnko a, ontumi ntena. Ɛba saa a, wɔn dɔ renyɛ sɛ TV so dɔ. TV ne sini mu de, awarefo yɛ nneɛma akɛse akɛse de kyerɛ wɔn dɔ. Nanso nea ɛma aware sɔ yɛ nneɛma nketenkete. Sɛ awarefo wewe, wɔfomfam wɔn ho, wɔpa wɔn ani akyi
... (5265 chars skipped) ...
u biara ho. Eyi bɛma moanya ɔdɔ kann, “Yah gyaframa,” ama mo ho. (Nmd. 8:6) Monyere mo ho nsua ahobrɛase na obiara nni ne yɔnko ni. Sɛ moyɛ eyinom nyinaa a, mo ani begye mo aware mu na mo soro Agya no koma atɔ ne yam. (Mmeb. 27:11) Woyɛ saa a, wo nso wubetumi aka asɛm a onua bi kae yi bi. Onua yi de mfe 27 na aware; ɔkae sɛ: “Sɛ manhyia me yere a, anka mɛyɛ dɛn? Ade rekye a ade resa nyinaa na yɛn aware sɔ ara na ɛresɔ. Nea ama eyi nyinaa ayɛ yiye ne sɛ yɛdɔ Yehowa, na nkɔmmɔdɛ mpa yɛn aware mu.”

Anidaso bɛn na ɛwɔ hɔ ma nnipa?
Nnipa bɛkɔ so ara anya nkɔanim wɔ nyansahu mu. Nanso, wohwɛ a bere bi bɛba a nnipa bɛtumi ama adesamma atena asomdwoe mu a obiara dwen ne yɔnko ho? Dabida. Ɛnnɛ, pɛsɛmenkominya ne adifudepɛ abu so wɔ wiase baabiara. Nanso, Onyankopɔn ahyɛ bɔ sɛ ɔbɛma nnipa anya asetena pa daakye.
Onyankopɔn Asɛm ka sɛ, bere bi bɛba a nnipa nyinaa bɛdodɔ wɔn ho. Ehu renka obiara, na obiara nso renteetee ne yɔnko wɔ hɔ.
Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na pɛsɛmenkominya afi hɔ?
Onyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa no, wamfa pɛsɛmenkominya anhyɛ ne mu. Nanso bere a onipa a ɔdi kan no hyɛɛ da yɛɛ Onyankopɔn so asoɔden no, ɔbɛyɛɛ ɔbɔnefo. Enti ɔno na ɔde pɛsɛmenkominya woo yɛn. Nanso anigyesɛm ne sɛ, Onyankopɔn nam Yesu so bɛma nnipa asan ayɛ pɛ a bɔne biara nni wɔn ho.
Onyankopɔn maa Yesu bɛwu gyee yɛn nkwa. Enti bɔne a yɛn nana a ɔdi kan no yɛe no renni yɛn so tumi bio. (Romafoɔ 5:19) Yesu wuo no ama nnipa anya daakye ho anidaso a ɛyɛ anigye. Saa bere no, nnipa renyɛ pɛsɛmenkominya na wɔrenyɛ bɔne nso bio.

Akyem Sɔhwɛ hene ne ne mpanyimfo de nhyehyɛe a ɛfa 2019 Ohum afahyɛ ho no ato gua ama ne manfo.
Nana ne n’atrankogua hyiam nnera, Kitawonsa 1, 2019 wɔ kurow no ahemfi. Bere a wɔhyiae no Nana maa ne mpanyimfo aso tee sɛ Ohum afahyɛ yɛ amammere ne amanne a ne nenanom de gyaa no.
Na ne saa no nti ɛwɔ sɛ ɔtoa so na nkyirimma nso ahu nea ɛyɛe a kurow no bae ne mpanyimfo a wɔkyekyeree kurow no.Nhyiam no ase no, Nana too ne nsa de frɛɛ mmabun no mu kandifo no sɛ ommetie nea ɛrekɔso na ɔmma ne mfɛfo no aso nte.
Nsɛmkyerɛwfo nso Nana angyaw wɔn mu.Nana de too gua se wɔde nnawɔtwe na asi hɔ sɛ wɔde rebɛhyɛ Ohum no sɛnea wɔyɛ no afe biara no.
Mmom, wɔde taboɔ ato dedeyɛ so nnanso wɔ ne kurow no mu.

Washington Quarters: Nidi a Ɛtra Hɔ Daa Ma U.S. Agya a Ɔhyehyɛɛ no
Washington quarter yɛ U.S. sika a ne bo yɛ cent 25 a wɔde mae fi 1932 kosi 1998, na wɔda so ara de anim no di dwuma wɔ quarter ahorow a ɛtoatoa so a woyii no adi fi 1999 no mu.
Wɔde mfitiaseɛ anim ne akyi mfonini no dii dwuma kosii 1998. Wɔde anim (anaasɛ ne fã bi) adi dwuma wɔ mmeae a ɛkyinkyini fi 1998, na wɔasesa akyi no ama ntoatoaso ahorow te sɛ ɔman no mu adan, ɔman mmɔnten so atrae, ne mprempren Amerika Mmea ntoatoasoɔ.

John Flanagan nkyerɛwde a edi kan “JF” wɔ Washington kɔn ase, wɔ ase nifa so a wɔatwa no sunsuma no mu. “LIBERTY” wɔ soro, na mintage afe no wɔ ase na “IN GOD WE TRUST” wɔ ase benkum so (bɛyɛ 8-o-clock gyinabea).
Mint agyiraehyɛde no, sɛ ɛwɔ hɔ a, ɛwɔ ase nifa so (4-o-clock gyinabea) wɔ nsɛm a efi

Hɔn mu pii tuaa hɔnankasa hɔn kaar akatua dze kɔr bea a wɔrekɛyɛ edwuma no. Binom dze hɔn akwanma ber na wɔdze yɛɛ edwuma no. Binom so serɛɛ kwan wɔ edwuma mu, na iyi maa wɔhweer hɔn akatua.

83 O Onyankopɔn, ntena hɔ komm; nyɛ komm! Nyɛ komm! Hwɛ! W’atamfo reyɛ basabasa, na wɔn a wɔtan wo no reyɛ dɔm. 2 Hwɛ! W’atamfo reyɛ basabasa, na wɔn a wɔmpɛ w’asɛm nso ayɛ dɔm.
3 Wɔrepam esum ase atia wo nkurɔfo; wɔrepam atia wɔn a wobɔ wɔn ho ban. 4 Wɔka se, “Bra na yɛnsɛe wɔn man sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn werɛ befi Israel kora kora.” 5 Wɔpenee wɔn apam no so kaa wɔn ho bɔɔ mu tiaa wo. 6 Edomfo, Ismaelfo, Moabfo, Hagarfo, 7 Gebalfo ne Amonfo ne Amalekfo ne Filistifo ne Tirofo ne 8 Asiriafo akɔka wɔn ho ama Amonfo ne Moabfo a wɔyɛ Lot asefo no dɔm no ayɛ den.
9 Yɛ wɔn sɛnea woyɛɛ Midianfo ne Siserafo ne Yabinfo wɔ Kison subon mu hɔ no. 10 Wudii wɔn so wɔ Endor maa wɔn amu porɔwee wɔ fam. 11 Yɛ wɔn a wodi wɔn anim no sɛnea woyɛɛ Oreb ne Seeb no; di wɔn ahene so sɛnea woyɛɛ Sebah ne Salmuna 12 a wɔkae se, “Yɛbɛfa asase a ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn de no” no.
13 Bɔ wɔn hwete sɛ mfutuma, O Onyankopɔn; sɛ ntɛtɛ a mframa bɔ gu. 14 Sɛnea ogya hyew kwae, sɛnea ogyaframa ma nkoko hyew no, 15 saa ara na fa ahum taa wɔn na fa wo mframa a ano yɛ den no yi wɔn hu. 16 Ma animguase nka wɔn, O Awurade, na ma wonhu wo tumi. 17 Ma wonni wɔn so nkonim na wɔmmɔ hu daa daa; ma wonwu wɔ animguase pɔtɔɔ mu. 18 Ma wonhu sɛ, wo nko ara ne Awurade Otumfoɔ wɔ asase so nyinaa.

1-2. Sɛn na ebinom te nka wɔ aware nhyehyɛe ho?
SƐ OBI reyɛ aware nhyehyɛe a, ebetumi ama n’ani agye paa. Yɛrekasa yi, sɛ wo ne obi reyɛ aware nhyehyɛe a, yegye di sɛ wopɛ sɛ ɛkɔ yiye. Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, nnipa pii deɛ tumi kɔ yiye. Onuawa bi a ofi Ethiopia a ne din de Tsion a ka sɛ: “Bere a na me ne me kunu reyɛ aware nhyehyɛe no, m’ani gyei papaapa. Mmere a m
... (6498 chars skipped) ... 
gyinae. Nanso sɛ moanka ankyerɛ obiara a, ebia mobɛtew mo ho, efisɛ mompɛ sɛ obiara behu. Wei nso de, ɛyɛ hu paa. Enti nyansa wom sɛ mobɛka akyerɛ wɔn a wɔbetumi ama mo afotu pa ne wɔn a wɔbetumi aboa mo wɔ akwan pɔtee bi so. (Mmeb. 15:22) Wɔn a mubetumi aka akyerɛ wɔn no bi ne mo abusuafo, mo nnamfo a wɔn ho akokwaw, anaa asafo mu mpanyimfo.

mo ho yiye. Moyɛ saa a, mo aware nhyehyɛe no bɛkɔ yiye; ɛbɛboa mo ama moahu sɛ mofata mo ho anaa.

Nnwom 76Nkwa Asem (NA-TWI)
Nkonimdifo Nyankopɔn
76 Wonim Onyankopɔn wɔ Yuda. Wɔhyɛ ne din anuonyam wɔ Israel. 2 Ɔwɔ ofi wɔ Yerusalem; ɔte Sion Bepɔw so. 3 Ɛhɔ na obubuu atamfo agyan, wɔn kyɛm, wɔn nkrante ne wɔn akode nyinaa.
4 O Onyankopɔn, w’anuonyam so! Wufi mmepɔw no a wudii w’atamfo so no so reba wo tumi so. 5 Woagye wɔn asraafo akokoduru no ho nneɛma nyinaa ama wɔada awufo nna. Wɔn ahoɔden ne wɔn nyansa nyinaa yɛɛ kwa. 6 Wobɔɔ wɔn hu no, O Yakob Nyankopɔn, apɔnkɔ no ne wɔn sotefo nyinaa wuwui. 7 Na wo Awurade de, obiara suro wo. Sɛ wo bo fuw a, obi ntumi nnyina w’anim. 8 Wubu atɛn fi soro; wiase suroe na ɛyɛɛ dinn, 9 bere a wosɔre buu atɛn a wode gyee wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no no. 10 Nnipa abufuw de ayeyi a ɛdɔɔso brɛɛ wo. Wɔn a wɔanwu ɔko no mu no, bɛhyɛ wo fa no nyinaa bi.
11 Nea wode ahyɛ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn bɔ no, fa ma no. Aman a mobɛn nyinaa mommrɛ no akyɛde. 12 Onyankopɔn ma nnipa suro no; ɔbrɛ ahenemma ahantanfo ase, na ɔbɔ ahene akɛse hu.

Gifty Eugenia Kusi (nee Kwofie) (wɔwoo no wɔ Kwakwar 11,1958) ɔyɛ Ghana amanyɛnyi .Nna ɔyɛ kuw ba wɔ mbrahyɛbagua fie a ɔtɔ do anan wɔ Fourth Republic wɔ Ghana wɔ Tarkwa-Nsuaem (Ghana parliament constituency) fitsi 2001 kesi 2017. Ɔsan so yɛ nhwehwɛmu boafo tsitsir wɔ community Health wɔ Ghana Suapɔn (University of Ghana Medical School - Korle-Bu).
Kusi (nee Kwofie) fir Nsuaem-Tarkwa wɔ Anee Mantɔw mu wɔ Ghana.
Kusi kitsa abɔdzin krataa a ɔyɛ Master of Philosophy degree wɔ Sociology wɔ Ghana Suapɔn (University of Ghana 1999.
Kusi awar wɔ mba baanan. Ɔyɛ Kristonyi a ɔkɔ asɔr wɔ Pentecost.
Kusi hyɛɛ n'amanyɛsɛm ase wɔ mfe mpem ebien na kor(2001) mu, ber a ogyinae na odzii nkonyim na ɔbɛyɛɛ mbrahyɛbaguanyi wɔ Tarkwa-Nsuaem abatow mpasua do. Ɔtsenaa egua no do mfe du-esia(16), a ɔmaa ɔbɛyɛɛ kuw ba wɔ mbrahyɛbagua fie a ɔtɔ do ebiasa, anan, enum na esia mu wɔ 4th Republic wɔ Ghana. Ɔyɛ NPP "Disciplinary committee nyi, Ghana Business committee, Ghana mbrahyɛbagua mu asɔe a ɔhwɛ Gender na mbofra do, na Ghana committee wɔ apomudzen ho ( Parliament of Ghana committee on Health ɔyɛ Ɔsoafo abedzi ekyir wɔ Anee Mantɔw mu.
Nna ɔyɛ nhwehwɛmu boafo tsitsir dze ma asɔe a ɔyɛ "Department of community Health" wɔ UGMS. Ɔsan so yɛ edwuma wɔ Korle-Bu-Teaching Hospital.

7 Woagye me afi me haw nyinaa mu, na mahu sɛ woadi m’atamfo so.

So worepere sɛ wubehu histogram kuw no nɔma? Sɛ saa a, ɛnde ɛnyɛ wo nkutoo na wowɔ. Ɛyɛ den ma nnipa pii sɛ wɔbɛte adwene a ɛfa histogram kuw nɔma ho ne sɛnea wobu ho akontaa no ase. Wɔ saa asɛm yi mu no, yɛbɛkyerɛkyerɛ adwene a ɛfa histogram kuw nɔma ho no mu na yɛde anammɔn anammɔn akwankyerɛ a ɛfa sɛnea wobebu akontaa ho ama. Yɛbɛsan nso de afotuo ne akwan bi ama wo a ɛbɛboa wo ama woanya mfasoɔ kɛseɛ afi
... (5117 chars skipped) ... 
n?)
Histogram Kuw Nnɔmba a ɛnteɛ a wobɛpaw no betumi de ɔhaw kɛse aba. Ebetumi ama wɔayɛ data nhwehwɛmu a ɛnteɛ, nsɛm a ɛnteɛ a wɔde ba awiei, na awiei koraa no, gyinaesi ahorow a ɛnteɛ aba. Eyi betumi anya ripple effect, na ɛde mfomso ne anammɔn a ɛnteɛ foforo aba. Enti ɛho hia sɛ yɛhwɛ sɛ Histogram Kuo Nnɔmba no teɛ ansa na wɔatoa so ayɛ data nhwehwɛmu biara.

“El Salvador na menyinii. Saa bere no, sɛ meyɛ asoɔden a, na me maame ka sɛ, ‘Ɔbonsam reba abɛkyere wo!’ Sɛ ɔka saa a, na me nso maka sɛ, ‘Ɔpɛ a, ɔmmra!’ Ná megye di sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ, nanso Satan deɛ, na mennye nni sɛ ɔwɔ hɔ.”
—ROGELIO.
Asɛm a Rogelio kae no, wo ne no yɛ adwene? Nsɛm a ɛdidi so yi, emu nea ɛwɔ he na wohwɛ a, ɛtɔ asom?
Yɛka Satan a, ɛnyɛ obi a ɔwɔ hɔ, na mmom nea ɛkyerɛ ara ne bɔne.
Satan yɛ obi a ɔwɔ hɔ, nanso nnipa ho asɛm nhia no.
Satan yɛ honhom abɔde a ɔwɔ tumi, na ɔwɔ nnipa so tumi paa.
Yɛfa nsɛm yi mu biara a, yɛbɛnya nnipa pii a wɔgye di. Nanso, adɛn nti koraa na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhaw yɛn ho hwehwɛ nea ɛyɛ nokware? Asɛm no ne sɛ, sɛ obiara nni hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Satan a, ɛnde wɔn a wɔka sɛ ɔwɔ hɔ no redaadaa wɔn ho. Sɛ nso ɛyɛ ampa sɛ Satan wɔ hɔ, na mmom nnipa asɛm mfa ne ho a, ɛnde nnipa pii suro no kwa. Nanso sɛ Satan yɛ ɔdaadaafo a ɔpiapia nnipa ma wɔyɛ nea ɔpɛ a, ɛnde na ne ho yɛ hu sen sɛnea nkurɔfo pii de wɔn adwene bu no.
Ma yɛnhwɛ sɛnea Kyerɛw Kronkron no bua nsɛmmisa a ɛdidi so yi: Yɛka Satan a, nea ɛkyerɛ ne bɔne anaa honhom abɔde a ɔwɔ hɔ ankasa? Sɛ Satan yɛ obi a ɔwɔ hɔ a, ɔbɛtumi ayɛ wo bɔne anaa? Ɔbɛtumi adi wo bɔne a, ɛnde dɛn na wobɛtumi ayɛ abɔ wo ho ban?

WENLONG HE dii kan suaa nyansahu ho ade wɔ Suzhou wɔ Jiangsu Mantam mu wɔ China. Ɔyɛ samufo ma nhoma bi. Saa nhoma no kyerɛ nyansahu ho nimdeɛ, na wɔde kɔ aman pii so. Wakyerɛkyerɛw nkrataa bebree ama wɔatintim wɔ nyansahu nhoma mu. Seesei deɛ, Wenlong He yɛ adwuma wɔ Scotland Suapɔn a ɛwɔ Strathclyde no. Bere a ɔyɛ aberante no, na ogye di sɛ nneɛma bi na ɛdannan maa nkwa bae, nanso akyiri yi obehui sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɛbɔɔ ade. Nyan! kyerɛwfo ne no twetwee nkɔmmɔ faa ne gyidi ho.

Dawid asɛm a ɛwɔ Dwom 37:25 ne nea Yesu kae a ɛwɔ Mateo 6:33 no kyerɛ sɛ Yehowa remma Kristoni biara ano aduan mmɔ no da anaa?
Dawid kyerɛwee sɛ onhuu “onipa trenee a wɔagyaw no, anaasɛ n’asefo srɛ aduan.” Ɔno ankasa suahu na ɛma ɔkaa saa asɛm no. Na onim paa sɛ Yehowa nsa nyɛ tiaa wɔ n’asomfo so. (Dw. 37:25) Nanso Dawid asɛm no nkyerɛ sɛ Yehowa akoa biara nni hɔ a obedi hia.
Ɛtɔ da a na Dawid ankasa ho kyere no. Wo deɛ yɛnhwɛ bere a Dawid guan fii Saul anim no. Na Dawid ho nneɛma asa enti ɔkɔsr
... (368 chars skipped) ... 
tuu n’akyidifo fo sɛ: “Monkɔ so nhwehwɛ ahenni no ne Onyankopɔn trenee kan, na ɔde nneɛma a aka yi nyinaa [te sɛ aduan, anonne, ne atade] bɛka ho ama mo.” Nanso Yesu san kae sɛ nkurɔfo bɛtaa ne “nuanom” na ebia wɔadi kɔm mpo. (Mat. 25:35, 37, 40) Biribi saa too ɔsomafo Paulo. Ɛtɔ da a na nea obedi ne nea ɔbɛnom mpo abɔ no.
Yehowa aka sɛ nkurɔfo bɛtaa n’asomfo wɔ akwan horow so. Ebia ɔbɛma kwan ma yɛn ho akyere yɛn sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a obenya asɛm abua Ɔbonsam. (Hiob 2:3-5) Eyi ho nhwɛso ne nea ɛtoo yɛn
... (368 chars skipped) ...
ne no ma wogyina pintinn. (1 Kor. 10:13) Yɛmma asɛm a ɛwɔ Filipifo 1:29 yi ntena yɛn adwenem: “Mo na Kristo nti wɔde hokwan no maa mo, na ɛnyɛ sɛ munnya ne mu gyidi nko na mmom sɛ munnyina n’ananmu nhu amane nso.”
Yehowa ahyɛ ne nkoa bɔ sɛ ɔrennyaw wɔn da. Yesaia 54:17 ka sɛ: “Akode biara a wɔbɛyɛ de aba wo so no renyɛ yiye.” Saa asɛm yi ne bɔhyɛ pii a ɛwɔ Bible mu no ma yehu sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛbɔ n’asafo ho ban. Nanso ɛtɔ da a n’asomfo bi hyia sɔhwɛ anaa ɔtaa ahorow; ebinom mpo de wɔn nkwa twa so.

Kenkan nsɛm a ɛrekɔ so wɔ wiase a ɛfa Yehowa Adansefo ho wɔ intanɛt so. Nneɛma pii nso wɔ ha a ɛbɛboa mmaranimfo ne nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔfo.
Amanneɛbɔ yi mu no, Akwankyerɛ Kuw no muni ka osuahu ahorow a ɛhyɛ nkuran. Ɛbɛma yɛahu sɛ, ɛmfa ho nea Yehowa nkurɔfo refa mu no, ɔreboa wɔn ama ‘wɔadi nkonim korakora.’
Amanneɛbɔ a efi Akwankyerɛ Kuw no muni hɔ ne osuahu ahorow a ɛwɔ video yi mu no da no adi sɛ, yare yi nyinaa akyi no, Yehowa rehyira asɛnka adwuma no so paa.

Sɔm dɛn se smɔl grup dɛn, na grup dɛn we kɔmɔt frɔm ɔda big rilijɔn we bin dɔn de. Jiova Witnɛs dɛn nɔto grup we kɔmɔt frɔm ɔda rilijɔn. Bifo dat, wi tink se wi de du di tin dɛn we dɛn fɔstɛm Kristian dɛn bin de du trade.
I pas 230 kɔntri dɛn usay Jiova Witnɛs dɛn de prich wit zil. Ilɛk usay wi de, na Jiova ɛn Jizɔs wi de obe pas ɛni ɔda pɔsin ɛn nɔto di gɔvmɛnt na Amɛrika ɔ ɛni ɔda mɔtalman gɔvmɛnt.—Jɔn 15:19; 17:15, 16.
Di tin dɛn we di bigman dɛn pan Gɔd biznɛs na Amɛrika rayt, nɔto dɛn wi de tich. Ɔl di tin dɛn we wi de tich, kɔmɔt frɔm di Baybul.

13Nanso, Saulo buaa sɛ, “Wɔrenkum obiara ɛnnɛ, ɛfiri sɛ, Awurade agye Israel ɛnnɛ.”
14Na Samuel ka kyerɛɛ nnipa no sɛ, “Mommra na yɛn nyinaa nkɔ Gilgal nkɔsi Saulo ahennie no so dua.” 15Enti, wɔn nyinaa kɔɔ Gilgal, na wɔhyɛɛ Saulo sahenekyɛ wɔ Awurade anim. Na wɔbɔɔ asomdwoeɛ afɔdeɛ maa Awurade, na Saulo ne Israelfoɔ nyinaa ani gyeeɛ.

SƐNEA WOBƐYƐ NO:
-
Siesie wo ho yiye. Dwen ho hwɛ nea enti a wɔkyerɛw saa asɛm no. Sua sɛ wobɛka nsɛmfua dodow bi abom akan ne nyinaa, sen sɛ wobɛbobɔ nsɛmfua no din mmaako mmaako. Hwɛ sɛ woremfa nsɛmfua bi nhyehyɛ mu, woremmɔ bi ntra, anaa woremfa asɛmfua bi nhyɛ foforo ananmu. Fa kasa mu agyiraehyɛde a ɛwɔ akenkan no mu nyinaa di dwuma.
-
Bɔ asɛmfua biara din yiye. Sɛ wunnim sɛnea wɔbɔ asɛmfua bi a, hwɛ nsɛm asekyerɛ nhoma bi mu. Wubetumi nso abɔ akenkan no a wɔakyere agu afiri so atie, anaa wubetumi abisa obi a onim akenkan yiye ama waboa wo.
-
Kasa ma emu nna hɔ. Ɛyɛ a ma wo ti so, bue w’ano yiye, na tɔ wo bo ase bobɔ nsɛmfua din kama. Bɔ mmɔden kenkan ma nsɛmfua no mpue yiye.

“Bere a wɔgyee Paapa too ayaresabea no, wɔyɛɛ ne mogya mu nhwehwɛmu. Da a wɔrebɛyi no no, yɛsrɛɛ dɔkota no sɛ ɔnka nea ɔhuiɛ nkyerɛ yɛn. Dɔkota no ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ biribiara yɛ kama, nanso ɔsan hwɛɛ mu bio. Nea ɔhuiɛ no maa ne ho dwirii no! Sɛɛ na nneɛma mmienu bi nkɔ yie koraa. Ɔpaa yɛn kyɛw na ɔma yɛkɔhuu dɔkota foforo. Seesei Paapa ho yɛ na ɛyɛ yɛn dɛ paa sɛ yɛanka yɛn ano antom.”—Maribel.
Sɛ obi yare na ɔredi ayaresabea akɔneaba anaa wɔgye no to hɔ a, ɛyɛ den paa. Nea ɛtoo Maribel no ma yɛhu
... (872 chars skipped) ... 
oforo atie nea ɔno nso wɔ ka.
Bere a moakɔhu dɔkota no aba. Wo ne ɔyarefo no nsusu nsɛm a dɔkota no kaeɛ ho. Boa no ma ne nsa nka nnuro a dɔkota akyerɛw ama no nyinaa. Hwɛ sɛ mobɛnya aduro papa atɔ. Afei hwɛ ma ɔmfa n’aduro bere-ano bere-ano. Sɛ nnuro no bi ne ne ho nnye a, bɔ dɔkota no amanneɛ ntɛm ara. Ka ne koma to ne yam, na hyɛ no nkuran ma ɔnni akwankyerɛ biara a dɔkota no de ama no so. Sɛ ɛhia sɛ ɔsan kɔhu dɔkota no a, hwɛ sɛ ɔbɛyɛ saa. Biribiara a ɛhia sɛ ɔhu fa ne yareɛ no ho no, boa no
... (872 chars skipped) ...
 kan no kaeɛ. Wonim ɔyarefo no, enti sɛ ne kasa anaa ne nneyɛe bi asesa a, wobɛtumi ama dɔkota no ahu.
Da obuo adi na kyerɛ anisɔ. Wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma wɔ ayaresabea no brɛ paa. Enti nya tema ma wɔn. (Mateo 7:12) Ma wɔnhu sɛ wobu wɔn na w’ani sɔ ntetee ne osuahu a wɔanya ne adwuma a wɔreyɛ nyinaa. Wei bɛhyɛ wɔn nkuran na wɔayi wɔn yam ayɛ adwuma.
Obiara nni hɔ a ɔbɛtumi akwati yareɛ. Nanso sɛ yɛn adamfo anaa yɛn busuani bi yare na yɛboa no sɛnea yɛbɛtumi a, yareɛ no remmunkam ne so.—Mmebusɛm 17:17.

.:STEPHEN
Wɔwoo no ɛsan tetee no sɛ Yehowa Danseni. Stefano abambui sɛ ɔbɛda nso wɔ ne sukuufo nyinaa ho. Enti na ɔte atua wɔ fie nanso wɔ sukuu ho de na ɔda nsow. Wotuu Stephen wɔ asafo no mu na wɔsan pamoo no wɔ sukuu bere woadi mfe 18. Ɔhweree n’abusua a wɔyɛ Yehowa Adansefo no na ofii ase nomee nnurubɔne, ɔde neho hyɛe ɔbraseɛ ne nsadweam mu, na onyae mma mmienu bere a ɔnware, a obiako wui esiane nna mu yare (STDS) ansa na onyaa mfe 21. Ogyae aware san waree bio wɔ mfe 25, wɔsan gyee Stefano toom bio sɛ Yehowa Danseni nanso ɔkɔɔso de neho hyɛɛ abrabɔ bɔne mu wɔ esum ase. N’asetra bɛyɛɛ basaa ma ohui sɛ ohia Onyankopɔn wɔ n’asetram, nti ɔtwee bɛn Yesu ma onyae asomdwoe ne anigye a eso bi nni.

Kɛzi ɛnee ɛvoya mɔɔ lumua la anu Dwuuma siezie funli na bɛazie ye ɛ?
Ɛnee Dwuuma ta sie awie mɔɔ kɛwu la ndɛndɛ wɔ kenle ko ne ala. Ninyɛne nwiɔ a ɛnee ɔmaa bɛyɛ ye zɔ ndɛndɛ a. Mɔɔ lumua la, avunli sɛkye ndɛndɛ wɔ Mediterranea Aduduleɛ ɛlobɔ wuluwulu ne anu. Mɔɔ tɔ zo nwiɔ, ɛnee bɛte nganeɛ wɔ zɔhane mekɛ ne kɛ ɔngile ɛbulɛ ɔmmaa ahenle mɔɔ ɛwu la nee ye abusua ne kɛ funli ne bala ɛkɛ ne mekɛ tendenle.
Edwɛkpa ne nee Gyima ne buluku ne ka menli nna mɔɔ bɛwule na bɛziele bɛ kenle ko ne ala la an
... (460 chars skipped) ... 
enle mɔɔ ɛwu la abusua ne nee ɔ gɔnwo mɔ fa ayile evuanlɛ kpokpa ye na bɛfa ɛdanlɛ bɛkyekye ɔ nwo. (Dwɔn 19:39, 40; Gyima ne 9:36-41) Ye kpalɛzoamra nee awie mɔ kola ba ɛkɛ, bɛsu, na eza bɛkyekye abusua ne arɛle.—Maake 5:38, 39.
Asoo bɛziele Gyisɛse kɛmɔ Dwuuma sie menli la?
Dwuuma dɔɔnwo sie bɛ avunli wɔ bolɛ bɔne mɔɔ ɛnee ɛbu zo wɔ Yizilayɛ ɛleka dɔɔnwo la anu. Bɛluale mɔɔ bɛyɛle la azo bɛzukoale mɔɔ tete selɛma ne yɛle la. Bɛziele Ebileham, Sɛla, Ayezeke, Gyekɔbo nee menli gyɛne wɔ bolɛ bɔne 
... (460 chars skipped) ...
nla ne anu kenlebie la.
Ɛnwomenlelielɛ ne mɔɔ ɛnee wɔ Mosisi Mɛla ne anu la ɛmmaa Dwuuma adenle kɛ bɛyɛ ɛzɛne nwo ngyehyɛleɛ wɔ zɔhane kenle ne. Kɛmɔ ɔhale dɔnehwele nsa na bɛabɔ Ɛnwomenlelielɛ ne abo yɛɛ Gyisɛse wule la ati, Dwosefi mɔɔ vi Arelematia la nee awie mɔ ziele ye wɔ mekɛ mɔɔ ɛnee bɛtɛkpokpale ye funli ne bɔkɔɔ kɛ bɛsie ye la. (Luku 23:50-56) Ɔlua ɛhye ati, Ɛnwomenlelielɛ ne pɛle nu la, Gyisɛse agɔnwo mɔ bie hɔle nla ne azo kɛ bɛkava nyile ngakyile bɛakpokpa ye.—Maake 16:1; Luku 24:1.

Nnipa pii de Bible mu afotusɛm ayɛ adwuma ama wɔatumi atoto wɔn sikasɛm yiye.
YƐ NHYEHYƐE PA
BIBLE MU AFOTUSƐM: “Nsiyɛfo nhyehyɛe de mfaso ba, na obiara a ɔpere ne ho de, ohia na ebehia no.”—Mmebusɛm 21:5.
NEA ƐKYERƐ: Nea wopɛ sɛ wode wo sika yɛ no, ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ ɛho nhyehyɛe, na wobɔ mmɔden di so. Enti, ansa na wubeyi sika de ayɛ biribi no, ɛsɛ sɛ wudi kan fa ho adwene. Kae sɛ, ɛnyɛ nea wopɛ biara na wubetumi atɔ. Enti fa wo sika di dwuma yiye.
NEA WUBETUMI AYƐ:
Yɛ wo sikasɛm ho nhyehyɛe na di so
... (625 chars skipped) ... 
 fa tɔ. Sɛ wode credit card totɔ nneɛma a, hwɛ sɛ nneɛma a wode atɔ nyinaa no, wubetua ho ka bosome biara. Ɛba saa a, ɛka a wode no bi remmɛka ho. Sɛ wode ka bi a, yɛ nhyehyɛe a wode betua, na bɔ mmɔden di nhyehyɛe no so.
Nhwehwɛmu bi a wɔyɛe kyerɛ sɛ, obi a ɔde credit card totɔ nneɛma no, ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ nneɛma dodow a anka ɔpɛ sɛ ɔtɔ no, ɔbɛtɔ aboro saa. Enti sɛ wowɔ credit card a, mfa ntɔ biribiara kɛkɛ.
